職缺: (Senior) Clinical Research Associate
公司名稱: IQVIA_艾昆緯股份有限公司
工作內容:
Join us on our exciting journey!

IQVIA™ is The Human Data Science Company™, focused on using data and science to help healthcare clients find better solutions for their patients. Formed through the merger of IMS Health and Quintiles, IQVIA offers a broad range of solutions that harness advances in healthcare information, technology, analytics and human ingenuity to drive healthcare forward.
One of FORTUNE’s ‘Most Admired Companies’, we offer unparalleled scope for a career in world-leading clinical research. Global projects, innovative tools and industry leading customers combine with outstanding support and clear career management which allows you to make a difference and to connect with great opportunities.

Clinical Research Associate – the role

Whether you’re beginning or continuing your career as a CRA, this role is an ideal stepping-stone. You’ll have training and development to plan and progress your career in the direction you choose. And you won’t do it alone – you’ll have dedicated mentoring and structured quarterly reviews on performance, promotion and bonus awards.

Award winning and innovative, we’ll give you access to cutting-edge in-house technology, allowing you to work on global projects but with a regional / home state travel remit, so no need for national travel. You’ll be building a smart and flexible career with no limits. 

While projects vary, your typical responsibilities might include:

•	Site selection, initiation, monitoring and close-out visits, plus maintaining appropriate documentation
•	Supporting the development of a subject recruitment plan 
•	Establishing regular lines of communication plus administering protocol and related study training to assigned sites 
•	Evaluating the quality and integrity of site practices – escalating quality issues as appropriate
•	Managing progress by tracking regulatory submissions, recruitment, case report form (CRF) completion, and data query resolution

You will need to be comfortable collaborating and communicating with a variety of colleagues and customers. Ideally you will also have a good basic knowledge of applicable clinical research regulatory requirements.
其他條件:
Minimum requirements: 

You should have:
•	A Bachelor's degree or equivalent in a health care or other scientific discipline
•	Successful completion of a CRA Trainee Program or at least three months of on-site monitoring experience
•	Alternatively, you should have an equivalent combination of education, training and experience

If you want to make an impact in a global market, where we are working to make a real difference to patient health, then apply now. You could be the difference.

職缺: Data Analyst (Lane Crawford Joyce Group)
公司名稱: 香港商俊思海外有限公司台灣分公司
工作內容:
Being the Data Analyst, the right candidate will
•	Conduct data mining and feature engineering to support Data Scientists on modelling
•	Develop intuitive and attractive static and interactive data visualizations using routine program
•	Distill quantitative and qualitative data to communicate compelling stories to diverse audiences
•	Training end users on new reports and dashboards.
•	Supporting initiatives for data integrity and normalization.
•	Provide quality assurance of imported data, working with quality assurance analyst if necessary.
•	Interact with internal business units to understand business drivers and validate new data.
•	Analyze existing data to generate insights for internal audience.
•	Work closely with data engineering and data scientist to build ETL pipelines
•	Manage and monitor multi-channel performance reports
其他條件:
•	Bachelor’s / Master’s Degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Physics, Computer Science, Engineering, Actuarial Science, Econometrics or related discipline.
•	Experience in data mining, data manipulation, statistical analysis and data visualization.
•	Above 2 to 3 years of working experience with big datasets and on large scale analytical projects.
•	Experience working with and supporting Data Scientist along the data science journey.
•	Experience with data analysis and data visualization using tools such as SAS, Excel, SPSS, R, Python.
•	Knowledge of graphics and visualization tools such as Power BI, Tableau, DOMO, Adobe CS 5 Suite, Qlik.
•	Ability to translate business requirements into non-technical, in layman terms.
•	Strong interest in data science.
•	Creative and curious with a can-do mentality.
•	Strong communication skills.
•	Excellent analytical skills.
•	Critical thinking: able to look at numbers, trends, and data and come to new conclusions based on the findings.
•	Ability to work with large amounts of information and see the 'bigger picture'.
•	Fluent in English.
•	Preferred background in retail, loyalty, ecommerce.

職缺: Energy Engineering_Battery Mechanical Engineer 電池機構工程師
公司名稱: Gogoro Taiwan Limited_睿能創意股份有限公司
工作內容:
Who We Are
一切緣起於一個革新能源使用與扭轉都市景象的念頭。為了看見改變，我們持續集結了許多領先技術及優秀人才。2021年，我們以前所未有的飛快速度成長，融入新點子、新面孔、新的夢想。我們不只是智慧雙輪公司，更不只是能源網絡公司，我們是車輛設計顛覆者、軟體應用潮流領導者，交通運輸方案的業界先驅。我們是Gogoro。

Meet the Team
Gogoro能源網絡提供使用者直覺、乾淨、安全、可靠、方便的能源交換系統，其核心的電池中儲存著驅動各式載具前進的能量，擺脫了纜線的束縛，Swap and Go。持續提升電池品質、安全性與便利性為Gogoro孜孜不倦努力的方向，每一個設計皆考量了使用者回饋與大數據，嚴謹且詳盡的產品認證代表著我們對於每顆電池的堅持。
電池機構設計團隊負責整個電池的材料選擇、結構強度、功能設計、安全認證、問題分析，偕同電力電子、軟韌體、電池特性部門，優化電池的容量、可靠度、與量產性，帶給使用者更佳的體驗。

Position Impact
身為電池機構工程師，你將致力於使用科學方法提升設計與解決問題，對於未知，從發想、設計到落實量產，建立假設、規劃實驗以求取答案，建立解決方案。透過與供應商、製造、品質團隊合作，制訂規格、開模生產、確保來料正確性、技術轉移及成品可靠度，同時協助取得各類國際認證，推動Gogoro能源網絡至世界各地。

Responsibility and Expectation
- 活用機械工程知識，結合理論與實務應用，以科學方法分析電池設計開發過程中之問題與現象，文獻、數據及資料支持，設計實驗確認問題根因，建置長效能、系統性的解決方案，並推導與驗證其功效。
- 建立跨部門協作關係，確實有效的共享資訊，以能源交換系統格局考量，綜合不同領域專業，共同創造設計上的最佳方案。
科系要求: 數學及電算機科學學科類、自然科學學科類
其他條件:
Requirements: 
- 大學以上工程相關領域學歷。
- 對機構設計懷抱熱忱。
- 具備基本電子電路知識。
- 擁有奔放且不被侷限的創造力。
- 具備問題解決能力。
- 具備資料收集及統整能力。
- 具備團隊意識，重視團隊成果及協作關係建立。
- 具備操作設計繪圖軟體能力，如Creo Parametric、ProE、AutoCAD。
- 具實驗報告整理歸納能力。
- 中文精通，英文略懂。
- 可配合公司需求短期出差。

除此之外，我們也希望人選具備以下幾項特質：
- 研發專案管理經驗。
- 熱流、結構分析相關經歷。
- 操作資料分析工具能力，Python、MATLAB等。
- 具備基礎電化學知識。
- 對能源產業有興趣。
- 具備駕照及汽車。

職缺: RD20171 Senior Data Scientist (資深資料科學家)
公司名稱: 華碩電腦股份有限公司
工作內容:
Are you fascinated by the infinite possibilities of cyber-physical systems? Do you dream of developing ambitious technologies that will bridge the physical and virtual world and define the future? Are you passionate about applying your expertise in your field of engineering or science? If the answer is yes, then the ASUS Robotics & AI Center is the perfect environment for you to thrive.
Our goal is to create a multidisciplinary team of the world’s brightest engineers to develop ambitious technologies that will define the future. If you have the passion, knowledge, and expertise to contribute to an elite team of international experts, we strongly encourage you to apply today.

Roles & Responsibilities
● Lead and mentor data scientists with a focus on efficient, result-driven experimentation to reduce time to market.
● Establish and advocate a culture of modern data science engineering best practices and design patterns.
● Work with data-infrastructure engineers to build up top-notch data infrastructure and tools.
● Work with other stakeholders to gain new insights from data by employing statistical and/or machine learning models.
● Proactively address problems with a research-thinking mindset and critically think about the pros and cons of different approaches.
● Independently read relevant literature and share your insights and knowledge with other stakeholders.
● Write clean, maintainable, and well-commented source code.
科系要求: 數學及電算機科學學科類、自然科學學科類
其他條件:
Qualifications
● Bachelor’s degree or higher in computer science, electrical engineering, mechanical engineering, applied mathematics, or a related field.
● 5+ years of industry work experience or equivalent.
● Exceptional academic track record with expertise in data science, statistics, machine learning, and/or artificial intelligence.
● Familiarity with and knowledge of the advantages and disadvantages of data warehouses, data lakes, data pipelines and batch and stream processing.
● Working experience with SQL and noSQL databases.
● Exceptionally strong understanding of fundamentals and problem solving skills.
● Understanding of software development best practices, including coding standards, code reviews, design patterns, source control management, and test automation.
● Programming skills in C++, Python, JavaScript, and/or Go.
● Strong verbal and written communication skills.

Benefits
● Work with experts from around the world
● Top-notch facility and compensation
● Fully English-speaking work environment in Taiwan
● Combination of the best aspects of a startup, academia, and a large international enterprise

About the ASUS Robotics & AI Center
The ASUS Robotics and AI Center is a world-class research and development laboratory that was established with the mission of developing ambitious technologies that will define the future. Our multidisciplinary team of the brightest engineers and scientists are dedicated to creating software-focused solutions that will solve some of the most enduring challenges in the fields of robotics and artificial intelligence. Learn more at araic.asus.com.

職缺: 【Analysis】Analytics Manager

We are looking for an Analytics Manager to lead our global website analytics function. You will implement tools and strategies to transform data analysis and reporting into actionable business insights.

In this role, we expect you to have strong logical reasoning skills and the ability to communicate effectively. Your goal will be to help our business use data to drive high performance and quality.

-	Define global website metrics KPIs and relevant data sources.
-	Select, configure and implement analytics solutions.

-	Extract reports and analyses from multiple sources (e.g. operations, IT, service, and applications).
-	Build systems to transform raw data into actionable business insights.
-	Apply industry knowledge to interpret data and improve performance.
-	Keep up-to-date of industry news and trends.
-	Managing agency of record as an extension to support the above activities.

-	Competent with Google Analytics, Tag Manager, Datastudio, Big Query.
-	Attention to detail and problem-solving aptitude.
-	Superb communication skills.

Technically leading a group of 5 to 7 algorithm engineers.
Actively participate in the scrum process working closely with all stakeholders (PMs, scrum master, other team leads and managers and all kinds of engineers – frontend, backend, full stack and algorithm in both Tel Aviv and Los Angeles) to discuss and decide what the stories to work on and what the deliverables are, then manage the full development cycle of the projects.

職缺: Android App Developer 軟體工程師 （高雄） 45K - 55K
公司名稱: 玩運彩網路有限公司
工作內容:
玩運彩網站和 APP 每月平均有 3 億瀏覽量，每月使用人數約 100 萬人。
2009 年以來，我們用 10 幾人的團隊完成許多目標，業績、獲利年年成長，也讓玩運彩網站成為運彩業內龍頭，並名列similarweb 台灣體育類網站第一名。
在這裡，我們強調平等與溝通，以解決問題為導向，拒絕官僚。我們以制度守護健康的團隊文化，維護良好的工作體驗，比方：年度盈餘 20% 分紅（近 5 年平均年終超過 10 個月）、海外員工旅遊、彈性上下班、每月的 Happy Hours、各式補助等等，希望讓每個成員都能感受到玩運彩是值得努力的環境。

必備條件
1. 熟悉 Android 開發，曾經有過 native APP 上架經驗
2. 曾有不同解析度、各種手機型號的排版經驗
3. 熟悉 Git version control
4. 熟悉 OAuth 2.0、RESTful API、JSON 格式資料處理
5. 熟悉第三方 SDK 串接經驗（FB、Firebase 等…）
6. 熟悉 APP 優化與效能調整

加分條件
1. 曾有過 Web Development 經驗
2. Unit Test / UI Test 經驗
3. 有使用 Google Jetpack 套件經驗

上班時間
每週五天，每日八小時，早上 9:00 ~ 下午 6:30。
沒有打卡制度，上下班時間自主管理（最晚 9:30 到公司），中午休息 1 小時半。

－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－

工作介紹
1. 負責 Android App 開發。
2. 採用 Android Studio 搭配 Java 與 kotlin 語言開發。
3. 對 coding style 有要求，有互相 code review 的制度，採用 git 版本控管。
4. 愛用 Slack，同事們總是不吝於分享技術，但我們更習慣面對面的討論，了解彼此的想法。
5. 有很棒的產品開發流程，尤其重視使用者體驗，我們有定期的使用者訪談計畫。產品決策過程以數據為主，不是憑個人直覺。
6. 難得的團隊精神，大家都會互相幫忙，一起解決各種難題。

團隊特色
1. 歡樂的工作氣氛，不僅認真工作也要認真玩。
2. 沒有打卡制度，彈性上下班時間，早點來就早點走，沒有人會攔你。
3. 吃不完的零食，喝不完的飲料。我們還有一台咖啡機！
4. 沒有常態加班，我們不用加班也可以年年達標！
5. 公司鼓勵大家多聽演講，全額補助加上公假，就算在南部也不擔心聽不到喜歡的演講。
6. 重視討論，更在乎同事的意見，大家都有發言權。

職缺: SWRD_Back​end Engineer (node.js) 後端工程師
公司名稱: Gogoro Taiwan Limited_睿能創意股份有限公司
工作內容:
Position Impact:

後端工程師的職務能貢獻公司推動複雜的商業運營系統穏定根基且高效能的解決方案。致力於系統設計，開發，編碼，測試與應用程式的編寫，以改善及優化現況的同時以公司整體的發展為藍圖建構未來的彈性與可擴充性。


Responsibilities:

• 創建具備使用資訊的完整性，安全性與隱私性的軟體平台系統。
• 在參與軟體系統服務工作的同時，掌握商業邏輯與功能需求，提案架構設計，軟體開發，測試發布與使用者回饋整體流程。
• 主動與軟體專案管理人員，跨團隊軟體工程師，軟體測試工程師展開深度的合作關係，以成熟穏重的思維共同創建高品質的軟體系統。
• 對於後端系統所發生的問題，在解決問題的過中能避免經驗陷阱，尋求並建置長久的解決方案，降低或預防客戶與使用者的負面體驗，不中斷商業運營與服務。


Requirements:

• 三年 node.js 應用程式語言開發。
• 大學畢業，資訊工程/資訊管理相關本科學系。
• 必須具有 Express Framework，ES6 Promise/ Async/Await，傳輸協議 HTTPs 和 Website/ API（REST）Server 的專案經驗。


Advanced Qualifications:

• 願意擁抱合作，產出高品質的工作，對團隊承諾並用行動來支持團隊目標。
• 富有想像與好奇心，能夠以嶄新的眼光探索商業邏輯，並運用軟體開發來實踐想法。
• 使用技術解決實際問題，並願意深入研究並快速完成任務。
• 對於 Linux 系統管理，CI/CD Pipeline 實作經驗。
• 具有熟悉資料庫（MySQL，MongoDB）模型設計，Schema 設計經驗，資料庫調校經驗。

職缺: 資料分析 專案諮詢顧問
公司名稱: 香港商凱渤維思有限公司台灣分公司
工作內容:
SKILLS & EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS

• Expert level in all business modelling and data analysis skills, esp. business operation/forecasting/budgeting/planning/costing....
• Min 2 years hands-on experience of data modelling
• Expert level in excel or other modelling tools
• A highly analytical brain and possess strong problem-solving skills
• Knowledge of operation analysis or finance and accounting analysis as practiced in large organizations
• A consultative approach and ability to present conclusions at senior management level.
• Outstanding written and verbal communication skills
• Relevant academic qualifications (Data Science, Finance, Management engineering, Mathematics or Computer Science related)

RESPONSIBILITY

• Deliver Performance Management and Operation Analysis solutions using data modeling tool (TM1) knowledge and expertise
• Lead task/development plan, cost and timeline of deliverables
• Lead requirements and prototyping/design workshops
• Design, Develop, & Implement data modeling (on TM1) Applications, apply and promote the Best Practices
• Develop & Implement ETL (incl. back end databases, OLAP and relational, as required), apply and promote the Best Practices
• Evaluate & Optimize the performance of TM1 solution
• Document, apply and promote the Best Practices
• Training and enablement workshops
• Build and foster strong client relationships at the implementation level and above as available, gaining credibility and trust
• Resolve first level customer issues in a timely and responsive manner

• 熟練掌握 資料分析 數據建模 各項技能
• 最少2 年 經營分析，運營分析，財務分析，供應鏈分析方向的資料分析 數據建模實踐經驗
• 具有多維分析能力的思維方式，具有很強的解決問題的能力
• 熟悉企業經營方向數據分析建模，如經營分析、銷售數據分析、成本分析、供應鏈分析、財務分析和管理會計知識
• 出色的書面和口頭溝通技巧
• 相關學歷（數據分析，管理工程，數學，財務，或計算機科學相關）

工作内容
• 透過資料分析、數據建模、報表分析、報表開發、等專業知識與業務專案經驗，為客戶提供績效管理解決方案
• 完成計劃分析、供應鏈分析、運營分析、預算預測等相關的經營分析開發
• 主導專案任務/開發計劃，數據分析建模，交付成本和時間表
• 設計，開發和實施數據分析建模（TM1）應用程序，應用和推廣最佳實踐
• 評估和優化解決方案的性能
• 專案文件，應用和推廣最佳實踐
• 為客戶提供培訓或者相關專案研討班
• 通過專案實施培養，建立緊密的客戶業務關係
• 一級客戶支援，為客戶提供及時準確的支持服務

[PS:  TM1是IBM的多維專業分析軟體，針對於TM1，我們會提供全面的培訓。面試考慮重點在於您目前在不同軟體上資料分析建模的技能]

我們是一家全球化的外資諮詢公司，致力於基於TM1為大型跨國集團/公司定製專屬的分析/計劃類軟體。 我們的崗位為資料分析 數據建模型商業諮詢顧問，作為績效管理解決方案的諮詢顧問，協助客戶優化經營管理方向的分析需求，如銷售分析，供應鏈分析，財務分析，倉儲分析等，尋求解決方案。 Cubewise的諮詢顧問不單單只是BI方面的設計開發，更是為客戶提供商業分析、經營管理優化等需求的解決者。 我們正在尋找數據分析方向 的 候選人。
其他條件:
• 具備好奇心與商業敏銳度
• 真心渴望幫助他人變的更好
• 熱衷於與客戶一起合作，解決業務上的挑戰
• 喜歡在多元文化環境中進行合作
• 不怕冒險，激勵他人，慶祝勝利，無論大小
在Cubewise團隊裡，我們分享知識，經驗和資源，以幫助彼此實現我們的專業目標，並在專業和個人方面更快速的不斷發展。

職缺: 資深使用者研究員 Senior UX Researcher [RD]
公司名稱: 酷遊天股份有限公司
工作內容:
KKday 的願景是讓每個人能夠隨心所欲地踏上旅程，足跡踏遍全世界。
即使疫情使跨國旅遊變得不可能，KKday 仍透過深化國內旅遊突破營收的上限，也成功獲得投資人的認可，於疫情最嚴重時募得 C 輪 7500 萬美金。

About the Role
UED（使用者體驗設計）團隊把關 KKday 使用體驗並確保我們的功能滿足使用者需求，在這裡完成一切預訂事宜，讓疫情受困的旅行愛好者輕鬆發掘下一個近在咫尺的特色體驗。
身為 KKday 使用者研究員，將與產品經理、產品設計師進行研究項目的推動，同時也需要帶領不同職能的合作對象完成研究，包括發現問題、研究流程策劃以及透過研究方法提煉真實需求，除此之外，你將經常組織使用者訪談，讓不同職能的合作夥伴一起收集使用者的反饋。
你的參與將會影響產品決策, 從使用者研究洞察轉化為產品功能與優化方向，幫助 KKday 為世界各地的旅人創造有意義的旅程。

What You'll Do
- 基於公司目標與市場需求，策劃使用者研究主題與目標。
- 定期規劃使用者訪談、易用性測試等使用者調查研究，挖掘使用者需求與痛點。
- 策劃受測者的招募流程，並根據目標使用者設定採樣條件與招募管道。
- 與產品經理 、產品設計師、數據科學家、市場行銷專家等等跨職能合作，以推動研究的進行。
- 分享使用者洞察報告，讓我們更了解使用者行為並提出優化方向。
- 根據使用者訪談迭代 Persona 痛點與需求，進行人群劃分，讓我們在產品規劃時，更聚焦目標使用者。
其他條件:
Who You Are
- 3 -5 年以上使用者研究經驗，1 年以上消費端產品研究經驗
- 主修心理學、人機交互、社會科學、服務設計、體驗設計或使用者研究相關領域的學位。
- 熟悉 UX 相關質化研究方法及研究限制，如使用者訪談、問卷設計、易用性測試、脈絡分析等等。
- 有跨職能合作經驗，良好的溝通能力，能依據各個主題簡單說明研究方法與執行步驟。
- 除了站在使用者的角度提出體驗建議之外，同時平衡公司的商業需求。
- 有基本的英文會話能力以及精湛的閱讀能力。

Bonus
- 電商、新創、旅遊產業的工作經驗。
- 你的使用者研究洞察報告，曾影響產品設計且獲得良好的成效。
- 擅長利用數據追蹤協助使用者研究。

職缺: RD20171 Senior Data Scientist (資深資料科學家)
公司名稱: 華碩電腦股份有限公司
工作內容:
Are you fascinated by the infinite possibilities of cyber-physical systems? Do you dream of developing ambitious technologies that will bridge the physical and virtual world and define the future? Are you passionate about applying your expertise in your field of engineering or science? If the answer is yes, then the ASUS Robotics & AI Center is the perfect environment for you to thrive.
Our goal is to create a multidisciplinary team of the world’s brightest engineers to develop ambitious technologies that will define the future. If you have the passion, knowledge, and expertise to contribute to an elite team of international experts, we strongly encourage you to apply today.

Roles & Responsibilities
● Lead and mentor data scientists with a focus on efficient, result-driven experimentation to reduce time to market.
● Establish and advocate a culture of modern data science engineering best practices and design patterns.
● Work with data-infrastructure engineers to build up top-notch data infrastructure and tools.
● Work with other stakeholders to gain new insights from data by employing statistical and/or machine learning models.
● Proactively address problems with a research-thinking mindset and critically think about the pros and cons of different approaches.
● Independently read relevant literature and share your insights and knowledge with other stakeholders.
● Write clean, maintainable, and well-commented source code.
科系要求: 電機電子工程相關、資訊工程相關
其他條件:
Qualifications
● Bachelor’s degree or higher in computer science, electrical engineering, mechanical engineering, applied mathematics, or a related field.
● 5+ years of industry work experience or equivalent.
● Exceptional academic track record with expertise in data science, statistics, machine learning, and/or artificial intelligence.
● Familiarity with and knowledge of the advantages and disadvantages of data warehouses, data lakes, data pipelines and batch and stream processing.
● Working experience with SQL and noSQL databases.
● Exceptionally strong understanding of fundamentals and problem solving skills.
● Understanding of software development best practices, including coding standards, code reviews, design patterns, source control management, and test automation.
● Programming skills in C++, Python, JavaScript, and/or Go.
● Strong verbal and written communication skills.

Benefits
● Work with experts from around the world
● Top-notch facility and compensation
● Fully English-speaking work environment in Taiwan
● Combination of the best aspects of a startup, academia, and a large international enterprise

About the ASUS Robotics & AI Center
The ASUS Robotics and AI Center is a world-class research and development laboratory that was established with the mission of developing ambitious technologies that will define the future. Our multidisciplinary team of the brightest engineers and scientists are dedicated to creating software-focused solutions that will solve some of the most enduring challenges in the fields of robotics and artificial intelligence. Learn more at araic.asus.com.

職缺: 招募顧問（Talent Acquisition Consultant）
公司名稱: 布爾喬亞公關顧問股份有限公司
工作內容:
常常有人問我們：【布爾喬亞】與其他同業有何不同？
先姑且不論我們對同業的定義是否一致，【布爾喬亞】尤其重視兩個核心發展：

1.	未來：未來五年、十年、或更久，「我們」的客戶與痛點各為何？需要提前在哪布局？準備什麼武器？
2.	效率：時間運用提升的關鍵在於熟知每個營運環節、並能對未來做出正確預測、然後能有效影響過程中每一個單位。

綜上兩點，我有幾個關鍵字：
#人才、#數據、#產品、#聯盟。

承上，幾個關鍵領域：
組織：招募獵才、組織設計、領袖培育；
服務：數據蒐集與分析、流程再造與創造、訂閱制與XaaS（S, D, P, DT...etc）；
市場：內容變現、文化變現、產業共好。

人才是唯一的資產、招募是唯一的策略。若能有100，我們絕不會要99人；能給我1000，我們就不要只有900。我們面試很仔細也很嚴格，所以面試量雖然大，但過關比例不高（每年約莫不到10%）。在主管逐漸成熟、樣貌更加差異化之後，我們必須要加速招募、且更有創意有系統進行多階層、多樣貌、綿密的招募行動，因此，一位良好的獵才招聘顧問是我們目前加速前進的必要角色。

您的角色，是專注在《招募與組織發展》領域中展現智慧與執行力，擔綱最前端的招募徵選。優秀的HR，總是期盼自己成為企業組織的形塑者，不論是擔綱最前端的招募徵選、最核心的組織設計、或最動態的訓練發展，其最高目標都是能替自己的組織創造當前最適、且永續發展的有機型態。要達到此目標，除了擁有良好的學識、豐富的生活經驗、以及紮實的實務訓練外，本身對於行銷與公關的涉獵程度，更是關鍵的決定要素。一言以蔽之，我們稱之為"形象設計師"。

布爾喬亞的創立初衷，即是建構一個互利共生、強調知識發展、以及個人與群體循環強化的生態系統。

我們要聘用與培養的，就是King / Queen Maker。不計個人名利榮辱，但求全體的突出與卓越。

對人力資源、組織發展有高度期盼的，來加入我們吧!

*****
工作職責：
招募與獵才面（80%）
     VOCAL MIDDLE 致力培育新「聲」代「布爾喬亞人」，招募具有潛力之社會新鮮人將是首要之務。
     規劃校園徵才：鎖定目標人才族群、制定整體形象定位、長期深耕校園關係。
     專業夥伴獵才：理解市場與組織現在與未來需求，主動出擊獵取文化契合之優異高手。
     蒐集資訊、理解未來性公關人才市場、定義組織人才需求，鎖定目標族群，傳遞理念、述說故事。
     作為組織內部的文化價值養成之推動者與守護者，給予經營團隊建議與提醒，創造與維持良好的工作環境與氛圍。
     
組織營運面（20%）
     組織文件之建立、撰寫、推廣。
     營運流程優化與強化，與各團隊溝通與執行。
     協助經營團隊建立解讀資料，尋找與建立集體智慧之方法論。
     軟性與硬性辦公環境之塑成，創造具備美感與平衡的工作環境。

尋才條件：
o	大學畢，1~2年外商獵頭經驗，負責兩種以上產業與十家以上客戶。
o	獨立運作、具備高度創意解決能力，按部就班的乖乖牌千萬不要來。
o	固定年薪50萬到60萬，外加激勵獎金；若有優秀實際規劃與執行招募計畫（無論是校園、正職）可以更高。

您未來的發展為：
     在專業領域上持續深耕，成為部門主管，帶領與管理更大幅度的專業部門；
     轉往騎士領域，成為業務主管。持續耕耘，則會成為封疆大吏！

職位重點補充：
    目前無須負擔管理責任，未來需視個人發展而定；
    具競爭力的月薪，保障年薪為13個月，另有年終分紅，本職務另設有激勵獎金。
科系要求: 商業及管理學科類、經濟社會及心理學科類、語文及人文學科類
其他條件:
Qualifications
● Bachelor’s degree or higher in computer science, electrical engineering, mechanical engineering, applied mathematics, or a related field.
● 5+ years of industry work experience or equivalent.
● Exceptional academic track record with expertise in data science, statistics, machine learning, and/or artificial intelligence.
● Familiarity with and knowledge of the advantages and disadvantages of data warehouses, data lakes, data pipelines and batch and stream processing.
● Working experience with SQL and noSQL databases.
● Exceptionally strong understanding of fundamentals and problem solving skills.
● Understanding of software development best practices, including coding standards, code reviews, design patterns, source control management, and test automation.
● Programming skills in C++, Python, JavaScript, and/or Go.
● Strong verbal and written communication skills.

Benefits
● Work with experts from around the world
● Top-notch facility and compensation
● Fully English-speaking work environment in Taiwan
● Combination of the best aspects of a startup, academia, and a large international enterprise

About the ASUS Robotics & AI Center
The ASUS Robotics and AI Center is a world-class research and development laboratory that was established with the mission of developing ambitious technologies that will define the future. Our multidisciplinary team of the brightest engineers and scientists are dedicated to creating software-focused solutions that will solve some of the most enduring challenges in the fields of robotics and artificial intelligence. Learn more at araic.asus.com.

職缺: Android App Developer 軟體工程師 （高雄） 45K - 55K
公司名稱: 玩運彩網路有限公司
工作內容:
玩運彩網站和 APP 每月平均有 3 億瀏覽量，每月使用人數約 100 萬人。
2009 年以來，我們用 10 幾人的團隊完成許多目標，業績、獲利年年成長，也讓玩運彩網站成為運彩業內龍頭，並名列similarweb 台灣體育類網站第一名。
在這裡，我們強調平等與溝通，以解決問題為導向，拒絕官僚。我們以制度守護健康的團隊文化，維護良好的工作體驗，比方：年度盈餘 20% 分紅（近 5 年平均年終超過 10 個月）、海外員工旅遊、彈性上下班、每月的 Happy Hours、各式補助等等，希望讓每個成員都能感受到玩運彩是值得努力的環境。

必備條件
1. 熟悉 Android 開發，曾經有過 native APP 上架經驗
2. 曾有不同解析度、各種手機型號的排版經驗
3. 熟悉 Git version control
4. 熟悉 OAuth 2.0、RESTful API、JSON 格式資料處理
5. 熟悉第三方 SDK 串接經驗（FB、Firebase 等…）
6. 熟悉 APP 優化與效能調整

加分條件
1. 曾有過 Web Development 經驗
2. Unit Test / UI Test 經驗
3. 有使用 Google Jetpack 套件經驗

上班時間
每週五天，每日八小時，早上 9:00 ~ 下午 6:30。
沒有打卡制度，上下班時間自主管理（最晚 9:30 到公司），中午休息 1 小時半。

－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－－

工作介紹
1. 負責 Android App 開發。
2. 採用 Android Studio 搭配 Java 與 kotlin 語言開發。
3. 對 coding style 有要求，有互相 code review 的制度，採用 git 版本控管。
4. 愛用 Slack，同事們總是不吝於分享技術，但我們更習慣面對面的討論，了解彼此的想法。
5. 有很棒的產品開發流程，尤其重視使用者體驗，我們有定期的使用者訪談計畫。產品決策過程以數據為主，不是憑個人直覺。
6. 難得的團隊精神，大家都會互相幫忙，一起解決各種難題。

團隊特色
1. 歡樂的工作氣氛，不僅認真工作也要認真玩。
2. 沒有打卡制度，彈性上下班時間，早點來就早點走，沒有人會攔你。
3. 吃不完的零食，喝不完的飲料。我們還有一台咖啡機！
4. 沒有常態加班，我們不用加班也可以年年達標！
5. 公司鼓勵大家多聽演講，全額補助加上公假，就算在南部也不擔心聽不到喜歡的演講。
6. 重視討論，更在乎同事的意見，大家都有發言權。

職缺: 資料分析 專案諮詢顧問
公司名稱: 香港商凱渤維思有限公司台灣分公司
工作內容:
SKILLS & EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS

• Expert level in all business modelling and data analysis skills, esp. business operation/forecasting/budgeting/planning/costing....
• Min 2 years hands-on experience of data modelling
• Expert level in excel or other modelling tools
• A highly analytical brain and possess strong problem-solving skills
• Knowledge of operation analysis or finance and accounting analysis as practiced in large organizations
• A consultative approach and ability to present conclusions at senior management level.
• Outstanding written and verbal communication skills
• Relevant academic qualifications (Data Science, Finance, Management engineering, Mathematics or Computer Science related)

RESPONSIBILITY

• Deliver Performance Management and Operation Analysis solutions using data modeling tool (TM1) knowledge and expertise
• Lead task/development plan, cost and timeline of deliverables
• Lead requirements and prototyping/design workshops
• Design, Develop, & Implement data modeling (on TM1) Applications, apply and promote the Best Practices
• Develop & Implement ETL (incl. back end databases, OLAP and relational, as required), apply and promote the Best Practices
• Evaluate & Optimize the performance of TM1 solution
• Document, apply and promote the Best Practices
• Training and enablement workshops
• Build and foster strong client relationships at the implementation level and above as available, gaining credibility and trust
• Resolve first level customer issues in a timely and responsive manner

• 熟練掌握 資料分析 數據建模 各項技能
• 最少2 年 經營分析，運營分析，財務分析，供應鏈分析方向的資料分析 數據建模實踐經驗
• 具有多維分析能力的思維方式，具有很強的解決問題的能力
• 熟悉企業經營方向數據分析建模，如經營分析、銷售數據分析、成本分析、供應鏈分析、財務分析和管理會計知識
• 出色的書面和口頭溝通技巧
• 相關學歷（數據分析，管理工程，數學，財務，或計算機科學相關）

工作内容
• 透過資料分析、數據建模、報表分析、報表開發、等專業知識與業務專案經驗，為客戶提供績效管理解決方案
• 完成計劃分析、供應鏈分析、運營分析、預算預測等相關的經營分析開發
• 主導專案任務/開發計劃，數據分析建模，交付成本和時間表
• 設計，開發和實施數據分析建模（TM1）應用程序，應用和推廣最佳實踐
• 評估和優化解決方案的性能
• 專案文件，應用和推廣最佳實踐
• 為客戶提供培訓或者相關專案研討班
• 通過專案實施培養，建立緊密的客戶業務關係
• 一級客戶支援，為客戶提供及時準確的支持服務

[PS:  TM1是IBM的多維專業分析軟體，針對於TM1，我們會提供全面的培訓。面試考慮重點在於您目前在不同軟體上資料分析建模的技能]

我們是一家全球化的外資諮詢公司，致力於基於TM1為大型跨國集團/公司定製專屬的分析/計劃類軟體。 我們的崗位為資料分析 數據建模型商業諮詢顧問，作為績效管理解決方案的諮詢顧問，協助客戶優化經營管理方向的分析需求，如銷售分析，供應鏈分析，財務分析，倉儲分析等，尋求解決方案。 Cubewise的諮詢顧問不單單只是BI方面的設計開發，更是為客戶提供商業分析、經營管理優化等需求的解決者。 我們正在尋找數據分析方向 的 候選人。
其他條件:
• 具備好奇心與商業敏銳度
• 真心渴望幫助他人變的更好
• 熱衷於與客戶一起合作，解決業務上的挑戰
• 喜歡在多元文化環境中進行合作
• 不怕冒險，激勵他人，慶祝勝利，無論大小
在Cubewise團隊裡，我們分享知識，經驗和資源，以幫助彼此實現我們的專業目標，並在專業和個人方面更快速的不斷發展。

職缺: 4H新光金控_ 資料工程師
公司名稱: 新光金融控股股份有限公司(新光金控/新光人壽/新光銀行/新光投信)
工作內容:
★Make a Difference
新光金控致力於成為最懂客戶需求的數位金融領導品牌。我們相信，融入客戶生活，聆聽客戶聲音，運用科技創造不凡體驗，才能創造企業持續成長的價值。面對金融科技的浪潮與挑戰，我們需要有共同信仰的你加入，一起翻轉數位金融的旅程 “Make a Difference”。

<在這裡您將負責的事為>
 (1) 資料倉儲系統資料整合及應用程式開發；
 (2) 資料倉儲系統資料交換ETL工具(informatica/Trinity/Teradata/shell)；
 (3) SQL程式撰寫、具備資料庫知識；

<條件要求>
<必要條件>

1. 具資料庫軟體應用程式語言操作能力(T-SQL/PLSQL)；
2. 具三年以上ETL操作工具操作經驗；
3. 具有 Linux 系統操作經驗；

＜加分條件＞

1. 計算機科學或量化相關領域的學位；
2. 曾經在金融產業工作或是有服務過這些產業客戶資料分析經驗者佳；
3. 具備資料清理、處理不同資料庫與落地到其他平台BI經驗；
4. 了解容器化 (Container) 技術 (eg: Docker)
其他條件:
【專業能力】
• 具備金融市場敏銳度
• 瞭解金融業化相關知識及技術
• 具備專案管理與執行能力
• 熟悉資料庫應用系統之架構與設計
【團隊文化】
1. SPARK: Think Strategically. Be Professional. Be Adaptive. Relationship-led. Keep Going.保持策略思考、具專業性、高適應性、團隊合作，並持續向目標前進

職缺: [Hsinchu]科技暨學術諮詢顧問 Science and Research Consultant (for STEM majors)
公司名稱: 沛思坦網路股份有限公司
工作內容:
工作概要：

在 Pacston Technology，我們整合了數據分析技術和客戶服務技能，以幫助客戶管理他們的學術成果。

我們正在招募內部顧問，他將協助評估學術相關的法律文件、科學研究和其他出版刊物。該顧問將在科技、科學和教育領域進行法律研究。高績效的顧問有望在 3-6 個月內成為經理。

我們在台北、新竹和台中市均設有辦公室，因此我們的顧問可以選擇最適合他們的工作地點。(需到台北接受教育訓練。)

目標：

- 審查科研文件並進行校對
- 搜尋和管理客戶的研究成果

職責：

- 審查和評估客戶的研究成果相關文件
- 管理日常法律事務
- 及時與客戶溝通
- 分配、管理機密和敏感資料

技能和資格：

- 注重細節
- 良好的英文書面溝通能力
- 能夠多工處理並管理專案進程
- STEM（科學、技術、工程和數學）專業/學位
- 不需要法律知識或相關工作經驗



Job brief:

At Pacston Technology, we integrate technology and customer service skills to assist our clients in managing their academic portfolio.

We are looking for an in-house consultant who will assist in the evaluation of academic related legal documentation, scientific research and other publications. The consultant will be conducting legal research in areas of technology, science, and education. A high-performing consultant can become a manager in 3-6 months. 

We have offices in Taipei, Hsinchu and Taichung city so our consultants can choose one that suits best for their working location. (Novice training takes place in Taipei Office.)

Objectives:

	- Review and proofread research documents
	- Search and manage clients' research studies

Responsibilities:

	- Review and evaluate documents about clients' research studies
	- Manage day to day legal affairs
	- Communicate with clients in a timely manner
	- Distribute confidential and sensitive materials

Skills and qualifications:

	- Attention to detail
	- Strong written communication skills
	- Ability to multitask and manage project deadlines
	- STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math) majors/degree
	- Legal knowledge or related working experience is not required

【工作內容】
協助處理雲端物聯網平台及軟體服務穩定度維持及相關技術問題，並達成應用服務SLA要求。雲端物聯網平台及軟體服務包含佈署於公有雲如Azure、AWS平台，或私由雲VMware、Openstack、KVM等環境之相關應用軟體及服務。
具體工作內容：
1.協助平台佈署、穩定運作及運作故障情況之排除，達成SLA的規範，部分時間需要on-call
2.與平台專業人士及提供商討論，優化管理資源架構，服務升級與擴減容，維持良好性能；並建立監控指標、日誌與自動化通報機制，提前對客戶預警及通報 
3.協助回覆Ticket提報問題、追蹤、分析；與提供定期效能巡檢與平台資料備份還原服務
4.技術文件撰寫與運維培訓教材開發，建立線上技術知識庫，提供客戶管理者培訓，使客戶能夠自主進行日常運維

【職務條件】
1.學歷：大學以上，資訊工程相關、其他數學及電算機科學相關、電機電子工程相關
2.資歷：不拘 (接受應屆畢業生)
3.語言：英文 中等以上，讀寫精通
4.對物聯網及軟體應用領域有熱忱興趣及有相關經驗者
5.具備客戶導向與服務熱忱
6.具問題分析與解決能力，與協調溝通能力
7.相關技能符合多項加分：
1) 具備Linux 作業系統(Ubuntu)與腳本程式Bosh, Bash, ansible shell等學習使用經驗
2) 具備容器技術Docker、Kubernetes、Openshift等開發管理經驗
3) 具備常見的監控和日誌系統，如 Prometheus, Grafana, ELK相關學習及管理經驗
4) 具備一種資料庫SQL、Non-SQL、時序資料庫使用及管理經驗
5) 具備Azure、AWS、GCP等相關學習及管理經驗
6) 具備Git, Gitlab(CI/CD) 相關學習及管理經驗
7) 具備一種程式開發語言及腳本能力；JAVA, C/C#, Python, Golang
8) 具備伺服器管理及建置相關學習及使用經驗
9) 具備計算機概念、網路通訊架構及應用軟體運作原理等基礎基本能力
科系要求: 資訊工程相關、資訊管理相關
其他條件:
1、轉投資關係企業帳務及稅務處理
2、熟悉內控稽核規則及具財報製作、合併報表、成本會計經驗佳
3、具企業BPM使/導入經驗
4、統計學概念對數字及資料敏感和統籌分析能力

職缺: Data Science Manager (視訊/線上面談)
公司名稱: 104人力銀行_一零四資訊科技股份有限公司
工作內容:
As a Data Science Manager at 104, you will lead a team to develop innovative new features and products that help user get a better job and help customer(company) find the best talent.
Our team apply machine learning models on diverse data to build products and features. We build systems to tackle hard problems in areas like job search and recommendation etc.
You’ll work with data scientist, product managers, designers, and engineers to build data driven features and products.
If you enjoy working with data to build products and solve hard problems in creative ways, you will fit right in.
Skill Requirements:
Background in Data Mining, Machine Learning, Information Retrieval, Natural Language Processing, or Statistics.
•Experience hiring and leading high-caliber data teams
•Experience partnering with engineering and product teams
•3+ years of experience delivering Machine Learning solutions.
•5+ years of experience developing high quality software.
•Fluent in one or more languages like Java, Python, R, Scala.
Work with us, we expect,
•Critical thinking: ability to track down complex data and engineering issues, evaluate different algorithmic approaches, and analyze data to solve problems
•Creativity: you can conceive of new data driven products, features, and technologies.
•Planning: ability to set and meet your teams objectives & milestones
•Results: you prioritize, focusing on ideas and features that will have significant, measurable impact
其他條件:
Masters, Phd in computer science, mathematics, statistics etc.

職缺: 相信動物協會-獸醫助理
公司名稱: 社團法人台灣懷生相信動物協會
工作內容:
[跟狗一起工作+幫助動物+學習醫療知識+加入一個打造夢想的團隊]

相信動物協會是由一群想幫助動物並講求科學的年輕人組成的動物保護團體，我們自2016年起透過系統化及科學化的方式來進行流浪犬的絕育工作，已在基隆市、台北市、新北市成功的減少流浪狗問題。2020年起我們開始著手進行桃園區的流浪犬高強度絕育計畫，目標在兩年內達成桃園市80％的母犬結紮比例。

我們擁有自己的醫療部門，由獸醫師以及醫療助理組成，負責絕育手術、急難救助，以及住院動物日常照護和醫療。醫療部門是我們整個絕育計畫中堅強的後盾，負責守護外勤部門的同事們帶回來的每一隻狗的健康。期待想幫助動物的你一起加入我們，與我們一起改善流浪動物處境！


[工作內容]
1. 餵食班：清潔犬隻籠舍、餵食、投藥、觀察並記錄犬隻身體狀況、環境清潔消毒。
2. 手術班：藥物注射、犬隻剃毛消毒、術區準備、搬運犬隻上下術桌、術中藥物給予、晶片植入、手術器械清潔滅菌、病歷紀錄登載、手術紀錄照片拍攝及其他相關文書工作。
3. 其他：協助其他部門同事搬運犬隻上下車、少量前線工作參與、定期協會團體會議/教育訓練課程參與。

[工作地點]
台北市
(由於協會仍持續擴張絕育計畫範圍，未來能樂於外派至其他縣市者尤佳)

[工作需求]
1. 不怕血、不怕髒、不怕狗貓屎尿及嘔吐物。
2. 喜歡動物，樂於為動物做事。
3. 有動保經驗或者理念者尤佳，可以在這裡找到一般工作得不到的成就感。
4. 自備交通工具者尤佳，因為工作地點並非大眾運輸方便抵達處。

[工作福利]
1.不定期舉辦進修課程（目前已舉辦：動物醫療、疾病認識、動保法規、汽車手排教學、電焊教學）
2.固定尾牙或春酒，考績達成有年終獎金
3.可帶自己的狗一起上班

[工作待遇]
無經驗者：前兩個月培訓期月薪28000，通過培訓期可獨立作業者，調整至30000，之後依能力調整薪資。
有經驗者：30000以上

★面試將分為兩階段，通過第一階段者，會在一週內通知進入第二階段甄選。
→第一階段：主管面試
→第二階段：現場面試，實地參與手術班及餵食班

★[履歷內容應包含]
履歷請包含真實基本資料、簡單自傳、工作經歷、動保或相關背景介紹、工作時間規劃、為何想應徵、如何認識相信動物協會、其他興趣及專長等。
其他條件: 有幼教教學，社團經驗佳

職缺: 招募顧問（Talent Acquisition Consultant）
公司名稱: 布爾喬亞公關顧問股份有限公司
工作內容:
常常有人問我們：【布爾喬亞】與其他同業有何不同？
先姑且不論我們對同業的定義是否一致，【布爾喬亞】尤其重視兩個核心發展：

1.	未來：未來五年、十年、或更久，「我們」的客戶與痛點各為何？需要提前在哪布局？準備什麼武器？
2.	效率：時間運用提升的關鍵在於熟知每個營運環節、並能對未來做出正確預測、然後能有效影響過程中每一個單位。

綜上兩點，我有幾個關鍵字：
#人才、#數據、#產品、#聯盟。

承上，幾個關鍵領域：
組織：招募獵才、組織設計、領袖培育；
服務：數據蒐集與分析、流程再造與創造、訂閱制與XaaS（S, D, P, DT...etc）；
市場：內容變現、文化變現、產業共好。

人才是唯一的資產、招募是唯一的策略。若能有100，我們絕不會要99人；能給我1000，我們就不要只有900。我們面試很仔細也很嚴格，所以面試量雖然大，但過關比例不高（每年約莫不到10%）。在主管逐漸成熟、樣貌更加差異化之後，我們必須要加速招募、且更有創意有系統進行多階層、多樣貌、綿密的招募行動，因此，一位良好的獵才招聘顧問是我們目前加速前進的必要角色。

您的角色，是專注在《招募與組織發展》領域中展現智慧與執行力，擔綱最前端的招募徵選。優秀的HR，總是期盼自己成為企業組織的形塑者，不論是擔綱最前端的招募徵選、最核心的組織設計、或最動態的訓練發展，其最高目標都是能替自己的組織創造當前最適、且永續發展的有機型態。要達到此目標，除了擁有良好的學識、豐富的生活經驗、以及紮實的實務訓練外，本身對於行銷與公關的涉獵程度，更是關鍵的決定要素。一言以蔽之，我們稱之為"形象設計師"。

布爾喬亞的創立初衷，即是建構一個互利共生、強調知識發展、以及個人與群體循環強化的生態系統。

我們要聘用與培養的，就是King / Queen Maker。不計個人名利榮辱，但求全體的突出與卓越。

對人力資源、組織發展有高度期盼的，來加入我們吧!

*****
工作職責：
招募與獵才面（80%）
     VOCAL MIDDLE 致力培育新「聲」代「布爾喬亞人」，招募具有潛力之社會新鮮人將是首要之務。
     規劃校園徵才：鎖定目標人才族群、制定整體形象定位、長期深耕校園關係。
     專業夥伴獵才：理解市場與組織現在與未來需求，主動出擊獵取文化契合之優異高手。
     蒐集資訊、理解未來性公關人才市場、定義組織人才需求，鎖定目標族群，傳遞理念、述說故事。
     作為組織內部的文化價值養成之推動者與守護者，給予經營團隊建議與提醒，創造與維持良好的工作環境與氛圍。
     
組織營運面（20%）
     組織文件之建立、撰寫、推廣。
     營運流程優化與強化，與各團隊溝通與執行。
     協助經營團隊建立解讀資料，尋找與建立集體智慧之方法論。
     軟性與硬性辦公環境之塑成，創造具備美感與平衡的工作環境。

尋才條件：
o	大學畢，1~2年外商獵頭經驗，負責兩種以上產業與十家以上客戶。
o	獨立運作、具備高度創意解決能力，按部就班的乖乖牌千萬不要來。
o	固定年薪50萬到60萬，外加激勵獎金；若有優秀實際規劃與執行招募計畫（無論是校園、正職）可以更高。

您未來的發展為：
     在專業領域上持續深耕，成為部門主管，帶領與管理更大幅度的專業部門；
     轉往騎士領域，成為業務主管。持續耕耘，則會成為封疆大吏！

職位重點補充：
    目前無須負擔管理責任，未來需視個人發展而定；
    具競爭力的月薪，保障年薪為13個月，另有年終分紅，本職務另設有激勵獎金。
科系要求: 商業及管理學科類、經濟社會及心理學科類、語文及人文學科類
其他條件:
1. EXCEL分析工具熟練，量化分析相關工作經驗 5年以上
2. 具有會員制度規劃與執行相關工作經驗2年以上 
3. Sales and Marketing Automation使用如: SalesForce, Iterable等相關數位工具
4.CRM會員經營相關經驗5年以上
5.有數據分析能力，具CRＭ數位行銷工具實務操作經驗
6.具市場觀察力及敏銳度，並具備優化會員生命週期的企圖心
7.需要熟悉以下公式:
COUNTIFS/SUMIFS/FILTER/UNIQUE/VLOOKUP/TEXTJOIN/SUBSTITUTE/LEN

職缺: (Senior) Pharmacovigilance Specialist
公司名稱: IQVIA_艾昆緯股份有限公司
工作內容:
Join us on our exciting journey!

IQVIA™ is The Human Data Science Company™, focused on using data and science to help healthcare clients find better solutions for their patients. Formed through the merger of IMS Health and Quintiles, IQVIA offers a broad range of solutions that harness advances in healthcare information, technology, analytics and human ingenuity to drive healthcare forward.
One of FORTUNE’s ‘Most Admired Companies’, we offer unparalleled scope for a career in world-leading clinical research. Global projects, innovative tools and industry leading customers combine with outstanding support and clear career management which allows you to make a difference and to connect with great opportunities.

Job Scope:

•	Performs safety case processing tasks including, but not limited to: Intake and triage tasks as performed by Clinical Safety Associate and/or Senior Clinical Safety Associate.

•	Reviewing incoming safety information for completeness and accuracy. 

•	Tracking and data entry Writing clinical narratives Generating queries. 

•	Contacting sites for missing and/or unclear information QC of cases. 

•	Generating regulatory reports Reconciliation Generating metrics. 

•	Serve as Safety Management key contact point on moderate to large sized studies/programs that are moderate to complex in scope of work with minimal guidance. 

Responsibilities: 

•	All aspects of Safety Management start-up process including writing Safety Management Plan, developing SAE form, etc. 

•	Attendance at team, client and investigator meetings  

•	Presentations Training of staff on safety processes 

•	Compliance with budget, including estimating monthly budget projections. 

•	Ensures compliance with client budget and proactively escalates potential scope changes or noncompliance with cost or time allocation to department managers 

•	May assist with bid defenses or other presentations 

•	May mentor and/or train new Safety Management staff Performs other related duties as assigned or requested by department management
科系要求: 藥學相關、醫藥衛生學科類、醫學系相關
其他條件:
Minimum requirements: 

•  Bachelor's Degree in one of the life sciences or clinical research and/or a licensed healthcare professional required.


If you want to make an impact in a global market, where we are working to make a real difference to patient health, then apply now. You could be the difference.

職缺: 13RD-資深數據工程師 Senior Data Engineer
公司名稱: 順立智慧股份有限公司
工作內容:
在 CYBERBIZ ，我們提供一站式的電商方案，整合線上商店、實體門市 POS、與倉儲管理，協助新手或轉型中的零售業者與企業經營電子商務。

隨著服務店家的客群規模與銷售額逐年增加，和累積越來越多的銷售紀錄與客戶資訊，我們也在思考如何從各種類型的資料設計自動化的分析與決策方案，以幫助店家經營不同來源與特性的客群，並超越預期的成長目標。CYBERBIZ 的 Data Team 正在尋找能夠協助打造這些方案的人才。

我們了解要達成上述目標會需要整合許多不同類型的技術。對電商領域有興趣的你不需要是位通才 –– 我們將工作內容和需求分為數項技術類別，只要你擅長任一個類別的工作內容，我們都鼓勵您把握機會提出申請。透過與組內成員之間的合作和交流，在發揮你的專長的同時，也會有機會接觸和學習其他類別的技術而有所成長。

【工作內容】
　❖  開發自動化的分析與決策功能，幫助數位化商家提升效率與營收
　❖  透過歷史服務資料與跨部門討論，發掘潛在的新功能提案
　❖  整合不同的資料來源，協助內部部門進行功能與企劃的效益評估

【資料傳輸與管理 / Data Pipeline】
　❖  設計不同資料庫、與其他形式資料來源之間的資料傳輸與 ETL 流程
　❖  管理和監測機器學習與分析功能所使用的資料庫
　❖  協助設計與管理機器學習相關的資料傳輸流程

【資料分析 / Data Analytics】
　❖  計算與驗證成效報表相關的數值與指標
　❖  協助設計成效報表相關的視覺化圖表
　❖  設計實驗與指標評估產品功能的效益

【資料科學與機器學習 / Data Science & Machine Learning】
　❖  根據功能需求評估適合的機器學習模型與演算法
　❖  實作、訓練、評估與改良機器學習模型
　❖  收集與整理訓練模型所使用的輸入資料
其他條件:
其他加分條件，若背景與能力符合其中一項類別所列出的條件（若橫跨多項的話當然更好），歡迎提出申請：

　◈  1~2 年以上的 Python 程式實作經驗
　◈  熟悉 Python 的數學計算與資料操作工具 (例如 numpy, pandas, scipy)；或是其他程式語言或分析軟體 (例如 R, MATLAB) 中相同功能的工具
　◈  熟悉使用 Git 處理版本管理
　◈  能主動尋找參考文獻與閱讀英文技術文件
　◈  能快速學習新技術，以及良好的溝通能力

【資料傳輸與管理 / Data Pipeline】
　◈  熟悉至少 1 種關聯式資料庫系統 (RDBMS) 與常用功能的操作語法 (例如 MySQL, PostgreSQL, MariaDB, MS SQL)
　◈  有管理資料倉儲 (Data Warehouse) 系統的經驗 (例如 BigQuery, Redshift, Snowflake)
　◈  熟悉批次處理與排程工具 (例如 Apache Airflow, Luigi, crontab, AWS Batch) 
　▣  (Plus+) 有 Pub/Sub 系統或資料串流 (Data Streaming) 的實作經驗 (例如 Kafka, Amazon Kinesis, Spark Streaming)
　▣  (Plus+) 熟悉至少 1 種非關聯式資料庫 (NoSQL) 的特性、操作與應用 (例如 MongoDB, DynamoDB, InfluxDB, HBase, Clickhouse)
　▣  (Plus+) 熟悉資料庫性能調校與優化
　▣  (Plus+) 有分散式資料運算技術相關的經驗 (例如 Apache Spark 或 Dask)
　▣  (Plus+) 機器學習開發/部署管理 (MLOps) 相關經驗 (例如 MLFlow 或 TensorBoard)

【資料分析 / Data Analytics】
　◈  有統計分析、商業分析，或資料科學相關的學科背景/工作經驗
　◈  熟悉資料視覺化的圖表種類、工具、與適合的應用場合
　◈  熟悉探索式資料分析 (Exploratory Data Analysis)
　◈  使用過至少 1 種商業分析報表工具 (例如 Tableau, Metabase, Power BI)
　▣  (Plus+) 熟悉資料視覺化相關的程式工具 (例如 matplotlib, Plotly, D3.js, Chart.js)
　▣  (Plus+) 熟悉關聯式資料庫系統 (RDBMS) 與常見的操作語法

【資料科學與機器學習 / Data Science & Machine Learning】
　◈  有機器學習、機率統計、資料探勘，或資料科學領域相關的學科背景/工作經驗
　◈  熟悉 Python 機器學習或統計模型相關的套件 (例如 scikit-learn, TensorFlow/Keras, PyTorch, XGBoost, spaCy, statsmodels, PyMC  等)
　◈  了解多種機器學習演算法 (例如迴歸模型、資料分群、決策樹、神經網路) 相關的運用以及效能評估方式
　◈  對機器學習領域的資料前處理 (pre-processing) 有基本概念
　▣  (Plus+) 熟悉自然語言處理 (NLP) 相關的課題、演算法與模型
　▣  (Plus+) 熟悉時間序列分析與預測模型
　▣  (Plus+) 熟悉搜尋引擎或推薦系統相關的演算法和工具

　▣  (Plus+) 熟悉至少 1 種非關聯式資料庫 (NoSQL) 的特性、操作與應用 (例如 MongoDB, DynamoDB, InfluxDB, HBase, Clickhouse)
　▣  (Plus+) 熟悉資料庫性能調校與優化
　▣  (Plus+) 有分散式資料運算技術相關的經驗 (例如 Apache Spark 或 Dask)
　▣  (Plus+) 機器學習開發/部署管理 (MLOps) 相關經驗 (例如 MLFlow 或 TensorBoard)

【資料分析 / Data Analytics】
　◈  有統計分析、商業分析，或資料科學相關的學科背景/工作經驗
　◈  熟悉資料視覺化的圖表種類、工具、與適合的應用場合
　◈  熟悉探索式資料分析 (Exploratory Data Analysis)
　◈  使用過至少 1 種商業分析報表工具 (例如 Tableau, Metabase, Power BI)
　▣  (Plus+) 熟悉資料視覺化相關的程式工具 (例如 matplotlib, Plotly, D3.js, Chart.js)
　▣  (Plus+) 熟悉關聯式資料庫系統 (RDBMS) 與常見的操作語法

【資料科學與機器學習 / Data Science & Machine Learning】
　◈  有機器學習、機率統計、資料探勘，或資料科學領域相關的學科背景/工作經驗
　◈  熟悉 Python 機器學習或統計模型相關的套件 (例如 scikit-learn, TensorFlow/Keras, PyTorch, XGBoost, spaCy, statsmodels, PyMC  等)
　◈  了解多種機器學習演算法 (例如迴歸模型、資料分群、決策樹、神經網路) 相關的運用以及效能評估方式
　◈  對機器學習領域的資料前處理 (pre-processing) 有基本概念
　▣  (Plus+) 熟悉自然語言處理 (NLP) 相關的課題、演算法與模型
　▣  (Plus+) 熟悉時間序列分析與預測模型
　▣  (Plus+) 熟悉搜尋引擎或推薦系統相關的演算法和工具

SKILLS & EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS

• Expert level in all business modelling and data analysis skills, esp. business operation/forecasting/budgeting/planning/costing....

• A consultative approach and ability to present conclusions at senior management level.
• Outstanding written and verbal communication skills
• Relevant academic qualifications (Data Science, Finance, Management engineering, Mathematics or Computer Science related)

RESPONSIBILITY

• Deliver Performance Management and Operation Analysis solutions using data modeling tool (TM1) knowledge and expertise
• Lead task/development plan, cost and timeline of deliverables
• Lead requirements and prototyping/design workshops
• Design, Develop, & Implement data modeling (on TM1) Applications, apply and promote the Best Practices
• Develop & Implement ETL (incl. back end databases, OLAP and relational, as required), apply and promote the Best Practices
• Evaluate & Optimize the performance of TM1 solution
• Document, apply and promote the Best Practices

• Build and foster strong client relationships at the implementation level and above as available, gaining credibility and trust
• Resolve first level customer issues in a timely and responsive manner

• 熟練掌握 資料分析 數據建模 各項技能
• 最少2 年 經營分析，運營分析，財務分析，供應鏈分析方向的資料分析 數據建模實踐經驗
• 具有多維分析能力的思維方式，具有很強的解決問題的能力
• 熟悉企業經營方向數據分析建模，如經營分析、銷售數據分析、成本分析、供應鏈分析、財務分析和管理會計知識
• 出色的書面和口頭溝通技巧
• 相關學歷（數據分析，管理工程，數學，財務，或計算機科學相關）

工作内容
• 透過資料分析、數據建模、報表分析、報表開發、等專業知識與業務專案經驗，為客戶提供績效管理解決方案
• 完成計劃分析、供應鏈分析、運營分析、預算預測等相關的經營分析開發
• 主導專案任務/開發計劃，數據分析建模，交付成本和時間表
• 設計，開發和實施數據分析建模（TM1）應用程序，應用和推廣最佳實踐
• 評估和優化解決方案的性能
• 專案文件，應用和推廣最佳實踐
• 為客戶提供培訓或者相關專案研討班
• 通過專案實施培養，建立緊密的客戶業務關係
• 一級客戶支援，為客戶提供及時準確的支持服務

[PS:  TM1是IBM的多維專業分析軟體，針對於TM1，我們會提供全面的培訓。面試考慮重點在於您目前在不同軟體上資料分析建模的技能]

我們是一家全球化的外資諮詢公司，致力於基於TM1為大型跨國集團/公司定製專屬的分析/計劃類軟體。 我們的崗位為資料分析 數據建模型商業諮詢顧問，作為績效管理解決方案的諮詢顧問，協助客戶優化經營管理方向的分析需求，如銷售分析，供應鏈分析，財務分析，倉儲分析等，尋求解決方案。 Cubewise的諮詢顧問不單單只是BI方面的設計開發，更是為客戶提供商業分析、經營管理優化等需求的解決者。 我們正在尋找數據分析方向 的 候選人。
其他條件:
• 具備好奇心與商業敏銳度
• 真心渴望幫助他人變的更好
• 熱衷於與客戶一起合作，解決業務上的挑戰
• 喜歡在多元文化環境中進行合作
• 不怕冒險，激勵他人，慶祝勝利，無論大小
在Cubewise團隊裡，我們分享知識，經驗和資源，以幫助彼此實現我們的專業目標，並在專業和個人方面更快速的不斷發展。

職缺: Patient Recruitment Lead
公司名稱: IQVIA_艾昆緯股份有限公司
工作內容:
Join us on our exciting journey!

IQVIA™ is The Human Data Science Company™, focused on using data and science to help healthcare clients find better solutions for their patients. Formed through the merger of IMS Health and Quintiles, IQVIA offers a broad range of solutions that harness advances in healthcare information, technology, analytics and human ingenuity to drive healthcare forward.
One of FORTUNE’s ‘Most Admired Companies’, we offer unparalleled scope for a career in world-leading clinical research. Global projects, innovative tools and industry leading customers combine with outstanding support and clear career management which allows you to make a difference and to connect with great opportunities.

Job Profile Summary:
	
Collaborate with pre and post award stakeholders to manage the coordination, planning, quality and implementation of Patient Recruitment and Retention operational plans on small/mid size studies. Position may be responsible for the implementation of smaller programs in their entirety. Communicate with sponsors and project teams to implement and monitor impact of the recruitment/retention tactical plan; make additional operational and tactical recommendations as needed based on study performance.  Collaborate with internal teams and external providers to deliver all appropriate tactics associated with the recruitment/retention strategy. Represent IQVIA Patient Recruitment at site/sponsor-facing meetings (i.e. KOM, IM, F2F/LL, etc.) to present strategy/rationale, train CRAs and site staff, and conduct recruitment support workshops as required. Ownership for study KPI and financial performance.

Essential Functions:

•	Work together with strategy team to translate recruitment and retention strategy into operational and tactical plans to positively impact recruitment and retention rates for assigned projects
•	Serve as internal consultant to project teams to implement operational recruitment plans on new and/or existing projects needing recruitment and retention services
•	Manage the scope of work, objectives, quality of deliverables, and other activities of assigned projects (based on scope, may co-manage or independently manage these projects)
•	Serve as primary operational project contact for patient recruitment and retention programs with sponsor to ensure appropriate communication channels are maintained and reporting schedules adhered to as required
•	Management of assigned project budget(s) to meet financial and company goals (realization targets)

Review, assess and process Safety data and information, across service lines, received from various sources and distribute reports/data onwards to both internal and external third parties following applicable regulations Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) and internal guidelines under guidance and support of senior operation team members.

Essential Functions:

•	To Prioritize and complete the assigned trainings on time.
•	Process Safety data according to applicable regulations, guidelines, Standard Operating procedures (SOPs) and project requirements. 
•	To perform Pharmacovigilance activities per project requirement including but not limited to, collecting and tracking incoming - Adverse Events(AE)/endpoint information.

•	Database entry
•	Coding AE and Products, writing narratives, Literature related activities as per internal/ project timelines.
•	Ensure to meet quality standards per project requirements.
•	Ensure to meet productivity and delivery standards per project requirements.
•	To ensure compliance to all project related processes and activities.
•	Read and acknowledge all necessary IQVIA standard operating procedures (SOPs) and customer SOPs as required. Ensure all required training is executed in a timely fashion and documented. Work towards ensuring your individual training plan and training transcript are reconcilable.

•	Identify quality problems, if any, and bring them to the attention of a senior team member.
•	To demonstrate problem solving capabilities.

•	100% compliance towards all people practices and processes

(Monday to Friday)

職缺: (Senior)/Investigator Site Contract Analyst
公司名稱: IQVIA_艾昆緯股份有限公司
工作內容:
Join us on our exciting journey!

IQVIA™ is The Human Data Science Company™, focused on using data and science to help healthcare clients find better solutions for their patients. Formed through the merger of IMS Health and Quintiles, IQVIA offers a broad range of solutions that harness advances in healthcare information, technology, analytics and human ingenuity to drive healthcare forward.
One of FORTUNE’s ‘Most Admired Companies’, we offer unparalleled scope for a career in world-leading clinical research. Global projects, innovative tools and industry leading customers combine with outstanding support and clear career management which allows you to make a difference and to connect with great opportunities.

Purpose: 

Coordinate and support the delivery of all required start-up contracting activities for selected sponsors, studies or multi-protocol programs as determined by either the agreed algorithm or the Sponsor’s requirements, including pre-award activities. Provide Legal advice on contracting language. Provide support to other the Regional Investigator Contract Analysts.

Responsibilities:

The role holder may be required to cover all or some of the responsibilities mentioned below but will focus on selected activities at any one time, depending on business requirements:
•	Develop contracting strategies and proposal text to support the proposal development process. 
•	Develop contract and budget language templates and contracting systems, tools, processes, and training materials for selected sponsors, studies or multi-protocol programs according to the Scope of Work and Project Plan, within the agreed project strategy. 
•	Ensure collaboration, including communication with sponsors, stakeholders and RSU regions and countries, to successfully deliver the agreed project scope in compliance with sponsor requirements and/or the RSU Management Plan. 
•	Provide specialist legal contracting support to facilitate efficient business development and initiation and maintenance of clinical trials, whilst enabling compliance with regulatory requirements. 
•	Create and/or review of core administrative documentation to support business development and enable study initiation and maintenance, as required. 
•	Assess and review the contracting landscape and contribute to the collection, interpretation, analysis and dissemination of accurate contracting intelligence to support assigned studies and the wider company, as required. 
•	Ensure overall contracting efficiency and adherence to project timelines and financial goals; report contracting performance metrics and out of scope contracting activities as required. 
•	Work with Quality Management to ensure appropriate contract management and quality standards. 
•	Mentor and coach colleagues as required. 
•	Deliver presentations to clients as required. 
•	Ensure accurate completion and maintenance of internal systems (with emphasis on CTMS), databases, tracking tools, timelines and project plans. 
•	May take a lead role in developing long standing relationships with preferred customers. 
•	Provide legal advice to colleagues in the Asia Pacific region on Investigator Site Contractual documents 
•	Provide legal advice to colleagues on country specific legal requirements in the Asia Pacific region

Bachelor's degree in law or a related field and 3 to 5 years' relevant experience, including demonstrable experience acting as a local or regional commercial contracts management specialist.

•	Good negotiating and communication skills with ability to challenge 
•	Good interpersonal skills and a strong team player 
•	Very Good legal, financial and/or technical writing skills 
•	Understanding of regulated clinical trial environment and knowledge of drug development process 
•	Knowledge and ability to apply GCP/ICH and applicable regulatory guidelines 
•	Knowledge of applicable regulatory requirements, SOPs and company’s Corporate Standards 
•	Proven ability to exercise independent judgment, taking calculated risks when making decisions

•	Good organizational and planning skills 
•	Good presentation skills

•	Good understanding of clinical trial contract management
•	Strong legal knowledge 
•	Strong English language skills both verbal and written
•	Ability to work well within a matrix team environment 
•	Ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships with co-workers, managers and sponsors.

職缺: 行政管理師（Office Administrator）
公司名稱: 布爾喬亞公關顧問股份有限公司
工作內容:
幾年前，我們看到一篇文章—「我不想成為英雄，我想成為坐在路旁鼓掌的人。」內心深受感動，也立即的與好友與同事們分享。

往往，我們都在拼命力爭上游、想著出人頭地，卻經常性地忽略 (或鄙棄) 這”第23名的女孩”。但，我們其實都非常明白，我們的人生道路上總是會偶爾出現這些天使，而許多時刻我們不僅非常感謝、更會對他們的油然自得與超高人緣感到羨慕與嫉妒。

進入了社會、開始了工作、當上了主管，我愈加清楚每一個優秀的組織與社會都有一群默默努力、為群體利益貢獻己力的人。他們樂觀、自愛、且總是為旁人著想。而擁有這些能力與特質的工作者，具備了一種難能可貴的天賦：讓人安心、使人穩定。

在【布爾喬亞】，我們每一天的生活都在緊湊與忙碌之中開始，也在緊湊與忙碌之間結束。總有一些時刻，我們會有不安與徬徨，這時，我們會尋求環境上的撫慰。就在這時，”第23名的女孩”便會施展魔力，讓我們得以放下緊繃，而重新找回力量。

現在，我們正在尋找這位第23名的女孩，說是女孩，其實只是取其故事的意涵而已。我們的顧問都是英雄，他們正在努力地寫下自己的篇章。【布爾喬亞】也是。

o	一年以上的辦公室行政經驗，熟悉一位行政同仁該有的能力、態度與本分；
o	具備高階主管秘書或業務部門行政經驗尤佳，是親友間的百寶箱、人間谷歌；
o	固定年薪最高50萬。
其他條件:
<Requirements>： 
3+ years of working experience with a degree of Master.

．Type 1: IE/IM/OR Back-ground:
(1) Master's degree in Industrial Engineering/Industrial Management/Operation Research/Supply Chain/Logistics, or other related areas 
(2) Experience in the manufacturing/consumer electronics industries is preferred.

．Type 2: Accounting/Finance Back-ground:
(1) Master's degree in Accounting/Finance/Business/Economics, or other related areas 
(2) Experience in manufacturing industries and Big 4 accounting firms is preferred.

職缺: 全端工程師
公司名稱: 美商倍佳國際股份有限公司台灣分公司
工作內容:
本公司擬聘僱一位具有天賦的Ruby on Rails軟體開發人員，以加入支援一項電子病歷軟體即服務產品之高效功能團隊開發陣容。您將負責開發及維護有關Rails應用程式和相關服務之伺服器端邏輯、測試效能、故障排除、並將前端元件整合至應用程式中。以及開發新的服務項目和解決方案。

依資歷而定，月薪為新台幣8萬至11萬不等。

為確認台端為成功的Ruby on Rails開發人員，您應具備Ruby和後端整合技術的豐富經驗。整體而言，一位高階Ruby on Rails開發人員必須能建立一套完全符合公司需求，且毫無瑕疵的操作碼。

Ruby/Ruby on Rails 開發人員職責：
• 設計及開發新的網路應用程式。
• 維護及現有的網路應用程式，並排除故障。
• 編寫及維護可靠的Ruby程式碼。
• 整合如中文亂碼(MySQL)之資料儲存解決方案 。
• 具亞馬遜網路服務(AWS)相關經驗及相關技術。
• 建立後端元件。
• 辨識及修復瓶頸和漏洞。
• 整合前端團隊所設計的使用者互動元素。
• 將應用程式連接至其他網路伺服器。
• 維護應用程式介面(APIs)。

Ruby/Ruby on Rails 開發人員必要條件：
• 具電腦科學、電腦工程或相關領域的學士學位。
• 具Ruby on Rails以及如Resque和RSpec函式庫的工作經驗。
• 具編寫乾淨的Ruby程式碼的能力。
• 熟悉包括Git、Github、SVN在內之程式碼版本控制工具。
• 具ReactJS、AngularJS、或BackboneJS相關經驗。
• 熟悉MVC、Mocking、RESTful、和ORM。
• 諳熟包括HTML5、JavaScript、和CSS3在內之前端技術。
• 具備包括Haml、Slim、ERB等在內之伺服器端模板語言方面的知識。
• 熟悉測試工具。
• 可在台灣遠端工作。

We are looking to hire a talented Ruby on Rails Developer to develop on a high functioning team supporting an Electronic Medical Records SaaS Product. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining the server-side logic for the rails application and related services, testing performance, troubleshooting, and integrating front-end elements into the application. Along with developing new services & solutions. 

To ensure success as a Ruby on Rails Developer, you should have extensive experience working with Ruby and back-end integration techniques. Ultimately, a top-level Ruby on Rails Developer can create clean, functional code that perfectly suits the needs of the company.

Ruby on Rails Developer Responsibilities:
•Designing and developing new web applications.
•Maintaining and troubleshooting existing web applications.
•Writing and maintaining reliable Ruby code.
•Integrating data storage solutions such as MySQL.
•Have some experience with AWS and related technologies.
•Creating back-end components.
•Identifying and fixing bottlenecks and bugs.
•Integrating user-facing elements designed by the front-end team.
•Connecting applications with additional web servers.
•Maintaining APIs.

Ruby on Rails Developer Requirements:
•At least 2-3 yrs experience with Ruby language
•Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field.
•Experience working with Ruby on Rails as well as libraries like Resque and RSpec.
•Ability to write clean Ruby code.
•Proficiency with code versioning tools including Git, Github, SVN.
•Experience with ReactJS, AngularJS or BackboneJS.
•Familiarity with MVC, Mocking, RESTful, and ORM.
•Good understanding of front-end technologies including HTML5, JavaScript, and CSS3.
•Knowledge of server-side templating languages including Haml, Slim, ERB, etc.
•Familiarity with testing tools.

* Remote in Taiwan is ok.
* Pay strictly depends on experience
科系要求: 資訊工程相關、其他數學及電算機科學相關
其他條件:
<Requirements>： 
3+ years of working experience with a degree of Master.

．Type 1: IE/IM/OR Back-ground:

(2) Experience in the manufacturing/consumer electronics industries is preferred.

．Type 2: Accounting/Finance Back-ground:
(1) Master's degree in Accounting/Finance/Business/Economics, or other related areas 
(2) Experience in manufacturing industries and Big 4 accounting firms is preferred.

職缺: 後端 PHP 工程師 PHP Engineer (CMS) [RD]
公司名稱: 酷遊天股份有限公司
工作內容:
[ 產業契機 ]
危機就是轉機，KKday 在旅遊業受到covid-19 疫情的衝擊期間募得 C 輪 7500 萬美金逆勢成長，其最大的原因來自於我們對信仰的堅持、機會的渴望及充滿創造熱情的文化，我們堅信且證實了疫情影響的不是人們對旅遊的渴望，而是在改變後的環境中，全世界旅遊的面貌需要變得更多樣化且更靈活。

[ 成長的市場與舞台 ]
在這樣的機會下，KKday 團隊接下來最大的目標就是快速深入全世界，其中 B2C 團隊更是需要衝在第一線面對來自世界的市場、用戶及更長的團隊戰線，並需要更迅速且科學化的團隊應變能力及合作模式．面對這樣的規模，沒有人能夠孤軍奮戰，但所有人都將擁有更大的舞台。

[ 開放 x 影響力 x Hacker ]
而整個 B2C 研發團隊在各職能間崇尚開放、成長、目標導向的文化，且我們堅信產品的上限源自於技術力能夠賦予整個團隊的想像，我們將持續抱持開放的視野，透過整合各項技術力來了解並服務每一個用戶。我們的企圖心很大，志在世界，因此我們的團隊需要持續的、大幅度的成長，我們需要每一個有創造力、渴望影響力、滿懷專業技能且富有Hacker精神的你加入一起為全世界的旅人打造最好的旅遊體驗。

[ Job Description ]
隨著市場的擴大，我們必須用更有效率的方式提供全球市場內容管理辦法來應變市場關鍵字的瞬息萬變，傳統的套版軟體＋人工運營將不再是可行的選項，隨著專業的 SEO 團隊與 AI 團隊到位後，我們需要堅強的內容工程團隊來跟我們一起啟動接下來一系列的企劃與挑戰！

[ Must Have ]
1. 兩年以上後端開發經驗．
2. 精通 PHP 語言．
3. 熟悉 MySQL 資料庫．
4. 熟悉 RESTful 概念並具備 API 開發經驗．
5. 熟悉 Git 版控
其他條件:
[ Nice to have ]
1. 有 WordPress 開發經驗．
2. 具備 API 效能優化經驗．
3. 有高併發系統優化經驗．
4. 有 SEO 優化經驗．

職缺: Product Marketing Manager

工作內容:
Please submit your application via KKLab Career Website (https://kklab.freshteam.com/jobs), as we will prioritize applicants resume on Career Website.

KKLab is looking for a Product Marketing Manager (PMM) to establish strategic marketing plans and drive product adoption for our AI-enabled SaaS.

As our go-to expert in marketing, you will lead the entire marketing cycle for our products, whether it is our primary business offering, KKRaaS, a recommender with music DNA optimized to diversify personalized experience with novelty and serendipity for media and e-commerce, or a consumer product, such as Lyricist.ai, a productivity tool built by creators for creators, empowering lyricists of all levels to initiate writing and overcome writer’s block.

As a member of the Venture Development team, you will collaborate closely with your cross-functional colleagues, such as product managers, sales representatives, data scientists, and researchers, to shape our product sets and narratives.
The ideal candidate will have the capability to navigate the organization and influence various stakeholders.


Responsibilities
- Develop product positioning, messaging, and value propositions.
- Evaluate product performance, synthesize customer feedback, and advocate for improvements.
- Maintain regular communication with internal stakeholders and teams to iterate on opportunities and objectives.
- Build deep product and customer knowledge using quantitative and qualitative insight to inform product roadmaps and GTM strategies.
- Engage with industry experts around the world and guide projects from pitch/development through to completion utilizing a creative approach.
Test the new marketing capabilities with product teams, focusing on measuring results.
- Coordinate and implement marketing activities with internal creative resources and external agencies (including content marketing, digital marketing, corporate marketing, and event marketing).
其他條件:
Qualifications
Minimum Qualifications:
- 5+ years of relevant experience in online marketing, advertising, or public relations.
- Ability to speak and write in English and Mandarin fluently.
Preferred Qualifications:
- Ability to build and lead a marketing team.
Strong analytical skills, especially in the design and analysis of experiments.
- Working effectively in a hybrid environment (remote/on-site).

職缺: Business Development Director, AI
公司名稱: 新加坡商科科實驗股份有限公司台灣分公司
工作內容:
Please submit your application via KKLab Career Website (https://kklab.freshteam.com/jobs), as we will prioritize applicants resume on Career Website.

KKLab is seeking a high caliber business development director to lead the BD team to set the sales strategy for KKLab's primary business Recommendations-as-a Service, KKRaaS and venture building business. 

For venture studio business, you will team up with external entrepreneurs, KKLab's product consultants and AI experts to brainstorm and evaluate business idea and come up with the collaboration model.

For KKRaaS, you will lead the salesforce to create the sales pipeline, build resell partnership and close deals. KKRaaS is a recommender with music DNA optimized to diversify personalized experience with novelty and serendipity for media and e-commerce. This no-code PaaS has enabled curators to blend business-specific logics with state-of-art algorithms for every stage of the user’s journey. The service has diversified music taste for millions of KKBOX users, and popped filter bubbles without compromising business goals of our B2B customers.


We are looking for a candidate who is self-motivated with smart interpersonal skills and passionate about diversity, user experience and B2B business. This role reports into the General manager of KKLab.



BD Managers' Responsibilities

Lead the sales team
Champion and develop a joint-venture model with external entrepreneurs.
Build the sales pipeline of business by aggressively identifying and initiating relationships with customers and working in close with product teams.
Acquire deals through outbound prospecting, cold emailing, pitching, and finalizing agreements.
其他條件:
Minimum Qualifications:

Experience building and leading a sales team
5+ years of experience in business development in software or internet industries.
Experience planning, delivering, and implementing lead generation plans.
Experience building inbound channels and partner relationships.
Demonstrated sales pitch skills, price negotiation techniques and agreements finalizing
Ability to speak and write in English and Mandarin fluently.

Preferred Qualifications:

Entrepreneurship 
Co-founder or founding team experience
VC, PE experience

職缺: Senior Software/ Data Engineer
公司名稱: 新加坡商科科實驗股份有限公司台灣分公司
工作內容:
Please submit your application via KKLab Career Website (https://kklab.freshteam.com/jobs), as we will prioritize applicants resume on Career Website.

KKLab is seeking a talented senior data engineer to build systems that collect and convert raw data into usable information for our AI systems, including recommendation engines, data analytics platforms, as well as systems that manage the data workflows among different components.  

KKLab has two complex AI products in the market, KKRaaS and Lyricist.ai. KKRaaS is a generic recommendation platform and Lyricist.ai is a lyrics generator. KKLab also incubates several AI projects. Our systems handle large amounts of customer-defined data of various types everyday. The data is ingested and used in both retraining AI models and analytic platforms automatically. Hence the data pipeline automation, quality monitoring, anomaly detection, fault recovery and computation efficiency are crucial to our system operation.

We are looking for a candidate who is self-motivated with strong coding skills and passionate about engineering excellence. We build our system by combining our in-house solutions with AWS cloud services and open source software. The candidate should be also familiar with the open source data engineering ecosystem. 



Responsibility
・Working with cross disciplinary teams including product managers, machine learning engineers, service engineers to develop enterprise-grade AI systems.
・Design, implement and optimize automated workflows to minimize human effort required in running machine learning processes, ETL processes, etc.
・Design and implement internal developer tool chains to facilitate the progress of product development..
・Design and implement data analytic tools to help data scientists generate insight
其他條件:
3+ years of experience in data engineering.
Expert in Python, Java, Scala, shell script. 
Working experience with developing software utilizing AWS, GCP or Azure services.
Working experience with tools that can help cloud service development, e.g. Kubernetes, Ansible, Terraform, Docker, etc.
Familiarity with relational databases and NoSQL DB.
Familiarity with big data technologies, such as Hive, Hadoop, Presto, Spark.
Familiarity with open source search solutions such as elastic search.

職缺: Software Engineer (士林)
公司名稱: Inventec_英業達股份有限公司
工作內容:
The Inventec Digital Center is a new research and development facility for all things related to Digital Transformation and Data-Centric AI.

The organization reports to the Board of Directors. Our primary mission is to influence and empower business and corporate units with digital knowledge constructively and collaboratively. We are responsible for implementing the digital strategy, discovering insights from the data, and executing them in the company.

We are a team with a broad spectrum of talents, including project managers, data scientists, AI researchers, and software engineers. The group is a flat organization, and we frequently collaborate with colleagues outside of our center, academic consultants, and business partners outside of the company. Our members thus enjoy the unique opportunity to publish in top-tier academic venues, author technical patents, and produce real-world impacts during their career in the center.

1. Build our platforms and systems, using experience with distributed systems, network system design, and large-scale storage systems.

2. Build internal systems used by Inventec users.

3. Mitigate reliability failures in a component or system.

4. Work with data and collaborate with data scientists.

5. Create and support a productive and innovative team, including working with peers, managers, and teams

數位中心為一直屬於董事會的研究與發展部門，主要負責公司數位轉型以及資料驅動／人工智慧專案的開發。我們與公司各單位／部門合作，從資料出發，發現資料中隱含之潛力與價值，進而提出具有建設性的建議。除了公司內部各單位／部門，數位中心也頻繁的與外界產學單位合作，其中包含國內外知名大學、企業合作夥伴。中心主要工作內容包含但不局限於數位決策、挖掘資料價值、以及系統落地與執行。中心組織結構扁平，直屬於部門主管，部門同仁多元且合作密切，涵蓋專案經理、資料科學家、人工智慧研究員、以及軟體工程師。數位中心鼓勵中心同仁將成果投稿至學術會議與期刊、技術專利並期許產出能對世界產生影響。

工作內容：
1. 運用分散式系統、網路及儲存相關的知識來建立大型平台
2. 建置給公司內部使用的系統
3. 減低系統內各類故障造成的不便
4. 進行數據處理、與資料科學家合作

部門額外福利：
【專業延伸】定期舉辦讀書會，部門同仁自發性地講解不同的專業知識，延伸同仁的技能組。

4. Familiar with Linux

Optional Requirement
1. Experience in frameworks like Django and Flask would be a plus

職缺: Software Engineer, Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)
公司名稱: 新加坡商科科實驗股份有限公司台灣分公司
工作內容:
Please submit your application via KKLab Career Website (https://kklab.freshteam.com/jobs), as we will prioritize the applicant's resume on Career Website.

KKLab is looking for a candidate who can combine software and system engineering skills to build and operate reliable, scalable, and distributed systems for our AI/ML-based SaaS.

As a member of the Technical Infrastructure team, you will help us manage the challenges of our cloud-native web services, like KKRaaS, which provides enhancing personalized experiences with musical DNA designed for media and e-commerce, proven by the adoption of KKBOX.

To improve operational efficiency and reduce the complexity of system design, you will work closely with peers such as data engineers, software architects, and researchers. Best practices will be ensured through this collaboration.

To be successful in this role, you should be resilient and enjoy solving problems with curiosity. An individual who works efficiently in a hybrid environment (both remote and on-site) is highly desired, as we strive to create an open and fault-tolerant environment.

Responsibilities
- Engage in and improve the whole lifecycle of service, from inception and design, through to deployment, operation, and refinement.
- Support services before they go live through activities such as system design consulting, developing software platforms and frameworks, capacity planning, and launch reviews.
- Maintain services once they have been launched by measuring and monitoring availability, latency, and overall system health.
- Practice sustainable incident response and blameless postmortems.
- Scale systems sustainably through mechanisms like automation and evolve systems by pushing for changes that improve reliability and velocity.
- Develop innovative solutions to ensure efficient SRE processes under regulatory requirements. Bring SRE expertise to the product teams that enforce regulatory requirements.
科系要求: 資訊管理相關、數學及電算機科學學科類、資訊工程相關
其他條件:
Qualifications

Minimum Qualifications:
- Experience in one or more of the following: Go, Python, Ruby, PHP, or shell scripting.
- Experience with version control systems (Git, Mercurial, etc).
- Experience with developing containerized and cloud environments (AWS, Azure, or GCP).
- Experience with SQL, NoSQL, cache, or search engines.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience in IaC (Ansible, Puppet, Terraform, etc).
- Experience with Unix/Linux or networking administration.
- Experience in operating containerized environments (Kubernetes, Nomad, etc).
- Experience in managing systems in cloud environments (AWS, Azure, or GCP).

職缺: Backend Engineer 後端工程師
公司名稱: 智齡科技股份有限公司
工作內容:
請上teamdoor投遞履歷：https://jubohealth.teamdoor.io/s/yPdeMLq3

Jubo 正在招募 Backend Engineer 後端工程師加入其位於台灣新北市、針對台灣本地市場的產品研發團隊。對於真正合適的人選，這會是可以與高速成長、並擁有廣大國際連結的科技公司合作的獨一無二機會。

如果你是熱衷從零開始加入團隊打造成功企業、並且擁有能夠在快速變化環境中蓬勃成長的敏捷度與適應力，那麼這個角色會很適合你。身在一個十分活力的團隊，你將能對 Jubo 的事業有直接影響力，在我們的工作生態下跨足眾多領域，並且接觸到前線最新科技。我們的創辦團隊期許能形塑一個讓所有員工能持續發展潛能、培植專業力的環境。我們目標大膽，追求卓越。

職務範疇
1.開發 API service (RESTful or/and gRPC)
2.撰寫 Unit Testing、Integration Testing
3.使用 RDBMS 或 NoSQL 資料庫及設計 table schema
4.與 PM、UI/UX designer、前端工程師、其他後端工程師緊密協作
5.主要作為 reviewer，與其他工程師進行 design review 及 code review
6.使用維運相關技術與工具促進開發效率，並能提出改進需求促進良好 DevOps 循環

必要條件
1.至少一年相關工作經驗
2.良好的溝通能力，自主學習能力強
3.熟悉 Go 或 Node.js (我們主要使用 Go)
4.熟悉 Linux 為基礎的開發環境及撰寫基本的 Shell Scripts
5.使用 RDBMS 或 NoSQL 的經驗 (我們使用 Postgres, MongoDB, Redis)
6.使用容器技術輔助開發 (我們使用 Docker) 

加分條件
以下是工作中會持續學習到的工具/平台，若你已經有經驗，將會非常加分！
1.具備 DevOps 意識
2.了解微服務架構及其開發方式
3.熟悉更多種資料庫與 MQ 的實務應用
4.了解 CI/CD 觀念，甚至熟悉 GitLab CI/CD 或 GitHub Actions (我們使用 GitLab CI/CD)
5.使用過雲服務平台 (GCP、AWS 或 Azure。我們使用 GCP)
6.了解 Kubernetes 編排原理及使用經驗 (我們使用 GKE)

薪資範圍：面議

我們重視的價值
1.身負社會責任：無論身份背景跟職業領域，我們期望每位員工能全方位兼顧謙遜、同理心、以及使命感，共事成長
2.熱愛探索學習：身在一個鼓吹終身學習的團隊，遇到新挑戰時，運用想像力跟執行力，找到多元方法實踐，向前邁進
3.自律及時間管理：我們自詡每位員工能良好自治並有所貢獻，鼓勵以更聰明的方式達成任務同時恪守職業倫理
4.堅毅的一顆心：創業精神不止於領導團隊，每一位成員都是參與、揉合並成為延續創新文化的重要一部分。勇敢踏出第一步，試錯再學，一起迎接未知挑戰。

關於 Jubo 智齡科技
Jubo 智齡科技是亞洲最大、致力於高齡照護產業的全方位科技企業。我們是一個想要打造新世代人性化照護和高齡生活的團隊，跨足行動科技、使用者經驗研究、資料科學、空間設計、護理及社會工作、海內外商業策略及客戶成功等專業領域。透過「We Connect Care」的核心價值，期許 Jubo 的科技開發應用，能夠順暢地串連跨系統資料、協助不同角色溝通，讓照護人員輕省、家人安心、專業決策者更放心，把省下來的時間心力，建立與高齡者更溫暖的互動連結。

自 2019 年，Jubo 數位照護健康資訊解決方案已經服務超過600 間長照、日照機構及居家服務單位，30,000名高齡住客、3,000 位照護專業人士，處理百萬等級的照護資料。Jubo 已獲得多項新創事業獎項殊榮、並持續鑽研技術與國際專利認證。研發總部位於台灣台北，同時正在拓展亞洲及北美的服務據點。歡迎你成為我們的夥伴，一起打造對高齡化社會具有正面影響力的世界級科技產品。
其他條件:
At a Minimum, We’d Like You to Have
- An M.S degree in a technical discipline such as computer science,  statistics, mathematics, operations research or economics
- 2+ years data engineering experience dealing with data model & schema design, pipeline architecture and managing the entire data lifecycle right from collection, processing, storage, versioning and archival.
- Deep knowledge of the technical stack, including but not limited to Hadoop, Spark, Airflow/Luigi, Presto, Hive
- Strong communication, presentation and interpersonal skills combined with sharp business acumen
- Be a self starter, with an ability to work in a matrixed environment and deliver quality results
- Experience with analytical data models for an ecommerce business is a plus
An ownership mindset and the ability to have fun!

3. 具網站分析工具實務經驗，熟悉Celebrus尤佳

職缺: 成功大學機械系 楊世宏實驗室 徵碩士級研究助理/博士後研究員
公司名稱: 國立成功大學_機械工程學系
工作內容:
我們設計侵入式腦機介面的演算法，將神經訊號轉譯為運動意念，用以操控外部的機器，幫助使用者執行日常生活的功能，例如操控滑鼠。我們同時利用動態系統的方法來探索神經訊號如何在大腦內傳遞資訊，試圖解開大腦內產生運動命令的謎團。
本工作著重演算法設計，訊號處理，程式設計，撰寫期刊論文，不做人體試驗與動物實驗，以發表期刊論文為目標，未來可出國深造、進入生醫/資料科學產業。

[工作內容]
1. 基礎8周訓練: 起聘前8週，每週報告一篇近3年的侵入式腦機介面期刊論文，了解腦機介面領域的發展與技術重點，用以補充腦機介面背景知識。
2. 研析國內外腦機介面的學術/產業發展現況，解決腦機介面尚未被解決的問題，提出新的方法，且該方法可被解釋。
3. 設計Python或者Matlab程式來處理神經訊號，開發侵入式腦機介面功能。
4.10%的工作時間需幫忙實驗室行政庶務、聯絡事項、撰擬會議紀錄以及臨時交辦事項。
5. 需配合老師臨時指派之研究工作，例如交接研究工作、協助其他成員的研究項目、申請IRB/專利。
6.撰寫期刊論文、期中報告書、口頭工作報告。

[未來工作發展]
1. 出國念書(在實驗室發表頂尖期刊論文，有助於申請頂尖學校)。
2. 本工作內容將接觸到神經訊號處理，也可能使用深度學習來達到此功能，學到的技術可通用於時序訊號處理的電機、機械、資訊、商務應用，亦可應用於圖形辨識，設計自動化偵測/辨識系統。
3. 本工作接觸的侵入式腦機介面技術，未來可應用於醫學工程、生醫訊號處理。
4. 所閱讀/報告的期刊論文，有助於了解目前學界、業界所面臨的工程問題，也了解最先進的深度學習技術。

[工作時間]
週一到週五9:30-18:30(含中午休息時間)。

[工作地點]
成功大學機械館，與學生共用20坪實驗室空間
實驗室網頁 https://nckunclab.wixsite.com/neuralcomputationlab

職缺: Marketing & Sales Assistant 行銷業務助理
公司名稱: 智齡科技股份有限公司
工作內容:
請上teamdoor 投遞履歷 https://jubohealth.teamdoor.io/s/wmEGSeJO

Jubo 正在招募 Marketing & Sales Assistant 行銷業務助理 加入其位於台灣新北市、針對台灣本地市場的產品研發團隊。對於真正合適的人選，這會是可以與高速成長、並擁有廣大國際連結的科技公司合作的獨一無二機會。

如果你是熱衷從零開始加入團隊打造成功企業、並且擁有能夠在快速變化環境中蓬勃成長的敏捷度與適應力，那麼這個角色會很適合你。身在一個十分活力的團隊，你將能對 Jubo 的事業有直接影響力，在我們的工作生態下跨足眾多領域，並且接觸到前線最新科技。我們的創辦團隊期許能形塑一個讓所有員工能持續發展潛能、培植專業力的環境。我們目標大膽，追求卓越。

職務範疇

1.協助公司小型工作坊舉辦，成功助攻銷售業績 (例如：線上報名表製作、報名狀況追蹤、2.電話邀請、工作坊當天接待及攝影等)
3.協助進行電話或網路市場調查收集資料
4.公司相關新聞媒體露出即時蒐集、截圖與建檔
5.蒐集整理照護產業社群 (Facebook) 社團名單、社群內容協作 (拍照、攝影、短影片製作)
6.公司官網「資訊與專欄」更新維護
7.主責公司周邊物品庫存盤點及三個辦公室需求申請處理
8.協助名片建檔與整理
9.公司內部、外部活動機動支援及現場側拍
10.主管交辦事項

必要條件

1.基本文書作業工具操作能力：Word/Excel/PowerPoint
2.喜歡與人互動，認真負責，具溝通協調能力。

加分條件

1.有活動側拍或是人物特寫拍照畫面構圖等基本能力
2.具影片拍攝、剪輯、製作等經驗

薪資範圍：年薪NTD 365,000 - 445,000

我們重視的價值

1.身負社會責任：無論身份背景跟職業領域，我們期望每位員工能全方位兼顧謙遜、同理2.心、以及使命感，共事成長
2.熱愛探索學習：身在一個鼓吹終身學習的團隊，遇到新挑戰時，運用想像力跟執行力，找到多元方法實踐，向前邁進
3.自律及時間管理：我們自詡每位員工能良好自治並有所貢獻，鼓勵以更聰明的方式達成4任務同時恪守職業倫理
4.堅毅的一顆心：創業精神不止於領導團隊，每一位成員都是參與、揉合並成為延續創新文化的重要一部分。勇敢踏出第一步，試錯再學，一起迎接未知挑戰。

關於 Jubo 智齡科技

Jubo 智齡科技是亞洲最大、致力於高齡照護產業的全方位科技企業。我們是一個想要打造新世代人性化照護和高齡生活的團隊，跨足行動科技、使用者經驗研究、資料科學、空間設計、護理及社會工作、海內外商業策略及客戶成功等專業領域。透過「We Connect Care」的核心價值，期許 Jubo 的科技開發應用，能夠順暢地串連跨系統資料、協助不同角色溝通，讓照護人員輕省、家人安心、專業決策者更放心，把省下來的時間心力，建立與高齡者更溫暖的互動連結。

自 2019 年，Jubo 數位照護健康資訊解決方案已經服務超過600 間長照、日照機構及居家服務單位，30,000名高齡住客、3,000 位照護專業人士，處理百萬等級的照護資料。Jubo 已獲得多項新創事業獎項殊榮、並持續鑽研技術與國際專利認證。研發總部位於台灣台北，同時正在拓展亞洲及北美的服務據點。歡迎你成為我們的夥伴，一起打造對高齡化社會具有正面影響力的世界級科技產品。

職缺: Software Architect
公司名稱: 新加坡商科科實驗股份有限公司台灣分公司
工作內容:
Please submit your application via KKLab Career Website (https://kklab.freshteam.com/jobs), as we will prioritize applicants resume on Career Website.

KKLab is seeking a software architect in machine learning to evaluate, identify and develop solutions either for venture building or our AI products.  

KKLab has two complex AI products in the market, KKRaaS and Lyricist.ai. KKRaaS is a B2B generic recommendation platform and Lyricist.ai is a lyrics generator. KKLab also incubates AI projects with potential and provides technical consultation to our startup partners. The software architect will be working with stakeholders, leadership and engineers to determine the best engineering solution to solve business problems. This requires engagement in every phase of the system development life cycle including: requirements generation, system and software design, implementation, integration & test, and verification & validation.

We are looking for a candidate, who is passionate about engineering excellence and looking for challenges in solving problems in different industries, with a broad range of working experience in building AI systems. This role will be leading cross team engineering task forces to deliver business results. 

Responsibilities
・Evaluate and identify potential technical solutions and make optimal decisions that align with business goals.
・Introduce and enforce best practices in developing and running AI systems.
・Maintaining awareness of emerging data/ML technologies.
・Analyze and modularize complex systems into reusable components.
其他條件:
・7+ years of Experience developing, deploying, and sustaining AI/ML systems using open source technologies or AWS services.
・Docker / containerization management and implementation (including container hardening)
・Experience developing software architectures (UML, microservices / services architectures, etc.)
・DevOps experience including CI/CD pipelines to build, test, deploy
・Ability to develop/create solutions under the situation with ambiguous or incomplete data on a fast-paced schedule.
・Ability to effectively communicate complex design information, technical decision and issues to both highly technical and non-technical peers
・Comfortable working in a fast paced and dynamic multi-disciplinary environment

職缺: Data Engineer (Intern)
公司名稱: 新加坡商科科實驗股份有限公司台灣分公司
工作內容:
Please submit your application via KKLab Career Website (https://kklab.freshteam.com/jobs), as we will prioritize applicants resume on Career Website.

KKLab is seeking a talented data engineer intern working with our engineering team to  build systems that collect and convert raw data into usable information for our AI systems, including recommendation engines, data analytics platforms, as well as systems that manage the data workflows among different components.  
KKLab has a recommendation platform in the market, KKRaaS. KKBOX is using our platform to provide personalized music recommendations for its users. Our candidate will be working on enhancing the data pipelines, which feed data into the recommendation platform, to improve the operational efficiency, reliability and maintainability of KKBOX recommendation.
We are looking for a candidate who is self-motivated with strong coding skills and passionate about engineering excellence. We build our system by combining our in-house solutions with AWS cloud services and open source software. The candidate should be also familiar with the open source data engineering ecosystem. 

Responsibility
Design, implement and optimize automated workflows to minimize human effort required in running machine learning processes, ETL processes, etc.
Design and implement internal developer toolchains to facilitate the progress of data pipelines.
其他條件:
Minimum Qualifications:
Working experience in Python, Java, Scala, shell script. 
Working experience with tools that can help cloud service development, e.g. Kubernetes, Ansible, Terraform, Docker, etc.
Familiarity with relational databases and NoSQL DB.
Familiarity with big data technologies, such as Hive, Hadoop, Presto, Spark.

職缺: 【PropTech數位人才招募】數據視覺化工程師
公司名稱: 信義房屋股份有限公司
工作內容:
【關於PropTech數位人才招募計劃】
信義企業集團的各項產品與計畫正融入大數據、機器學習與人工智慧等應用，我們的數位團隊也持續致力於「房地產科技創新」與「數位居住生活」兩大面向，以創新智能工具，為使用者提供超乎想像的服務體驗。
我們希望讓居住在這片土地上的人們，在「不動產交易買賣」與「居住生活日常」有更好的保障與體驗，也期待你與我們一起，加速這個改變。
這裡匯聚了40年的集團產業資源，以及多元化的人才；接下來，想邀請你加入，與我們一起創造超乎想像的體驗，成就即將到來的未來！

【職務說明】
1. 打造各式創新呈現方式，將各種數據分析: 會員分群、會員行為預測、數據分析報表等結果可視化。

4. 熟悉Git或CI/CD

2. 具參與敏捷開發團隊工作模式。 
3. 具backend開發技術經驗。 
4. 熟悉可視化套件開發 (Google Chart / D3.js / HighCharts 等)，對視覺感受有偏執者
5. 具撰寫自動化測試經驗。

職缺: Product Marketing Manager
公司名稱: 新加坡商科科實驗股份有限公司台灣分公司
工作內容:
Please submit your application via KKLab Career Website (https://kklab.freshteam.com/jobs), as we will prioritize applicants resume on Career Website.

KKLab is looking for a Product Marketing Manager (PMM) to establish strategic marketing plans and drive product adoption for our AI-enabled SaaS.

As our go-to expert in marketing, you will lead the entire marketing cycle for our products, whether it is our primary business offering, KKRaaS, a recommender with music DNA optimized to diversify personalized experience with novelty and serendipity for media and e-commerce, or a consumer product, such as Lyricist.ai, a productivity tool built by creators for creators, empowering lyricists of all levels to initiate writing and overcome writer’s block.

As a member of the Venture Development team, you will collaborate closely with your cross-functional colleagues, such as product managers, sales representatives, data scientists, and researchers, to shape our product sets and narratives.
The ideal candidate will have the capability to navigate the organization and influence various stakeholders.


Responsibilities
- Develop product positioning, messaging, and value propositions.
- Evaluate product performance, synthesize customer feedback, and advocate for improvements.
- Maintain regular communication with internal stakeholders and teams to iterate on opportunities and objectives.
- Build deep product and customer knowledge using quantitative and qualitative insight to inform product roadmaps and GTM strategies.
- Engage with industry experts around the world and guide projects from pitch/development through to completion utilizing a creative approach.
Test the new marketing capabilities with product teams, focusing on measuring results.
- Coordinate and implement marketing activities with internal creative resources and external agencies (including content marketing, digital marketing, corporate marketing, and event marketing).
其他條件:
Qualifications
Minimum Qualifications:
- 5+ years of relevant experience in online marketing, advertising, or public relations.
- Ability to speak and write in English and Mandarin fluently.
Preferred Qualifications:
- Ability to build and lead a marketing team.
Strong analytical skills, especially in the design and analysis of experiments.
- Working effectively in a hybrid environment (remote/on-site).
